Welcome to Nino's Italian Restaurant
We provide a true classic Italian dining experience, thoughtfully prepared and attentively served. Ninoâs Cucina Italiana has a warm, welcoming setting thatâs perfect for family meals & gatherings. Come join us for dinner, just minutes from Buckhead and Midtown, on Cheshire Bridge Road.
Our Story
Reservations
Ninoâs is a Zagat rated restaurant with rave reviews. Enjoy our throwback vibes and classic red sauces in our dining room.
Come in and dine with us. Make a reservation today with Resy.
Make a Reservation
Legendary Reputation
âThe closest weâve found in Atlanta to a true Little Italy treasure. The other concepts are fine if youâre looking for a good copy. If you prefer the real thing, go to Ninoâs.â

â Georgia Trend Magazine, 2002
Order Now
Ninoâs Authentic Italian Bar in Atlanta
We invite you to explore our authentic Italian bar menu and hometown history right here in Atlanta, Georgia.

An "After Work" bar that is particularly popular with people who want to socialize or grab a drink after finishing their workday
Learn More
Customer Reviews
Check out our most recent reviews!
Jennifer Brenner
Ninos has been around for so long because they never disappoint. Weâve gone on random date nights and a few valentines dates and the food/service is always top notch.
Cathy Winkler
We had a delicious lunch at Nino's in the perfect bright yellow blue and white surroundings. The hostess Alessandra and owner was very hospitable and attentive to everyone there even chasing after customers who forgot their boxed leftovers and another couple a sweater too. I had a dish with a pasta I've never had
...
before calamarata pasta with rapini and sausage in a delicious delicate herb sauce. Micah the chef and co-owner came out to check on the guests as they ate. it was a great dining experience. I can't wait to try out the dinner menu it looks intoxicating!
I just saw that they have baked clams and I've been looking for these for 40 years in Atlanta I'm definitely coming back at night!
Read More
Stanley Jennings
I eat at Nino's only once per year, which is a shame. Every time I go the service is amazing, the food is delicious, and the environment is very reminiscent of Italian style restaurants I would have experienced the child in New York... Just a lot of fun! I highly recommend the restaurant, however, in this world of not
...
needing reservations, I do recommend that you make a reservation to ensure you have a good time and a good table ... Thank you Nino's!
Read More
Nino's Dress Code
We politely ask our customers to observe our dress code.
Men:  No cut off tees, jeans with holes, or hats in the maintaining room.
Women: No hats, cropped shirts, or overly revealing leisure wear in the maintaining room dining room.
Guest can dine at the bar while dressed this way but may not dine past the entrance to the main dining room.

name: Pasta Da Pulcinella
address: 1100 West Peachtree St NW, Atlanta, GA 30309
raw_text: Pasta da Pulcinella Home Restaurant Menu Drinks Reservations Gift Cards Chef Profile Events Welcome Home Restaurant Menu Drinks Reservations Gift Cards Chef Profile Events Welcome Cozy Italian Dining romantic evenings, group outings, & private events Finally open at the new location Welcome back to Pasta da Pulcinella! We are delighted to serve you again from our new location at 1100 West Peachtree St. NW, in the heart of Midtown Atlanta. Come and enjoy the charm of our new yellow house – a completely renovated 1924 historic bungalow featuring dedicated private event space, two bars, spacious patio seating, and pizza oven. We are most grateful to our patrons, for allowing our dreams to continue, and for trusting us to host your first date, your proposal dinner, your wedding rehearsal, your anniversary, your family gatherings, and your business events since 1994. We look forward to resuming our tradition of excellence, and we thank you for being a crucial part of our continued success. Pulcinella originated as a character in the 17th Century Commedia dell’ Arte; it is a symbol of effervescence, joviality, and facing uncertainty of the future. These characteristics are not only reflected in the extraordinary Domenico Tiepolo Pulcinella drawings that adorn our walls, but also in the lively buzz, friendly service, and Chef Bibbiano’s creative menu offerings, with his renowned signature dish: Tortelli di Mele — round ravioli filled with Granny Smith apples, sausage, and parmigiano topped with brown butter and sage. Phone (470) 748-2223 Location 1100 West Peachtree Street NW Atlanta, GA 30309 Parking We offer valet parking during dinner service from 5:00 pm—10:30 pm for a $15 fee, through Peach Parking Solutions . We are on the left side of West Peachtree (one way street). Payment forms accepted include cash, Venmo, Apple Pay, Zelle, and CashApp. For those who don’t mind a short walk, we also offer a partial validation at the Moxy Hotel Parking Garage (48 13th Street) which discounts $10 off for up to 2 hours. Other nearby decks include the M by Radius Apartments and Northside Medical Center (both neighboring us on either side on W. Peachtree St.) where guests may opt to park for full price. Lunch Mon — Fri: 11:30 am - 2:30 pm Dinner Mon — Thurs: 5 pm — 9:00 pm Fri — Sat: 5 pm — 9:15 pm (*Last reservation timeslot may vary, please call to confirm your table) For information about private events please contact Tana Jo, Event Manager, at (404) 876-1114 or email pastadapulcinella@gmail.com. Pasta da Pulcinella offers special event menus for a memorable night, including Holidays, Rehearsal Dinners, and Catering. For the various menu options please visit our Special Occasions section. Reservations Call (404) 876–1114, or book online with Open Table. Reservations appreciated for large parties. For information about private events please contact Tana Jo, Event Manager, at (404) 876-1114 or email pastadapulcinella@gmail.com . MAKE A RESERVATION Hello, World! What a delicious gift Nothing says you care more than a delicious meal, and what better way to deliver it than with a gift card to your favorite restaurant? Phone (404) 876-1114 Location 1100 West Peachtree Street NW Atlanta, GA 30309 Parking Self Parking at Nearby Decks Available Lunch Mon–Fri 11:30 am to 2:30 pm Dinner Every Day 5 pm to Close Chef Bibbiano, Head Chef at Pasta da Pulcinella Since 1994, Pasta Da Pulcinella has been a place of the reknown Zagat Survey, Frommer’s Guide to Atlanta, and a host to nation-wide clientele. In 2000, the restaurant moved off Peachtree street in favor of a more intimate atmosphere. Pasta Da Pulcinella has undergone changes but has maintained the classic appeal that made it famous. Table linens, oil paintings of Tuscany, classic melodies, and the scent of fresh pasta fill the air. Chef Bibbiano has been the heart of Pasta Da Pulcinella for over fifteen years. He diligently maintains the restaurant’s original menu, all the while creating additional dishes each week with the freshest ingredients. Unassuming and quick with a smile, Chef Bibbiano keeps his small kitchen full of laughter and the joy he gets from his work. About the Business
Business owner information
Fred D.
Business Owner
Established in 1979, Malone's is Atlanta's original casual dining restaurant.  Our 27 years of success is due to fresh ingredients, made from scratch recipes and our attentive staff.  Our menu features aged midwestern beef, extensive seafood selections, fresh chicken, pasta and mouthwatering desserts.  We can accommodate large groups with a short notice.

Lasagna Bolognese- Homemade Lasagna layered with a rich meat ragú, ricotta, & mozzarella. $15
Gnocchi
Tomato & basil sauce $14                       Pesto and chicken $16                      Bolognese Meat Ragu $15
Ravioli
Ravioli di Spinaci e Ricotta- Ravioli stuffed with fresh spinach & ricotta cheese.
Choice Of:   Tomato & basil sauce $14      Pesto & Chicken $16       Bolognese meat ragu sauce $15
Ravioli di Pollo all’ Arrabiata- Ravioli stuffed with chicken & vegetables in a spicy tomato sauce. $14
​
Ravioli Di Aragosta Con Scampi - Homemade lobster and shrimp ravioli in a creamy pink sauce with sauteed crab meat, lobster, shrimp, and sundried tomatoes topped with arugula. $26
Risotto
Funghi - Wild mushrooms in a parmesean butter cheese sauce. $19
Scampi E Asparagi - Shrimp and Asparagus in a saffron parmesan cheese sauce. $22
Frutti di Mare E Zafferano - Shrimp, clams, mussels, scallops, & calamari in a saffron sauce. $25
Speciale
Pollo All Mattone-  Half chicken seasoned with garlic & herbs then grilled for the Tuscan flavor. Served with sauteed veggies & roasted potatoes. $14  (add sautéed spinach for $4)
​
Pollo Picatta- Seasoned chicken breast sautéed with capers & artichokes in a lemon butter sauce served with sauteed veggies & roasted potatoes. $20
​
Pollo alla Parmigiana- Breaded pounded chicken breast topped with melted mozzarella cheese
& marinara sauce served with sautéed broccoli & roasted potatoes. $20
​
Branzino Livornese- Seasoned Mediterranean Sea Bass filet in a light spicy tomato sauce served with grilled yellow squash & asparagus. $24
Salmone alla Rucola- Salmon filet sautéed with arugula in a lemon butter sauce
served with sautéed broccoli & roasted potatoes. $23
​
Grouper Alla Puttanesca - Seasoned grouper fillet with sauteed kalamata olives, green olives, and capers in a white wine- fresh tomato sauce served with roasted Sorelle potatoes and mixed veggies. $24
* Bistecca al Pepe Verde- Ribeye Steak sautéed with green peppercorns in a brandy creamy sauce served with roasted potatoes & grilled asparagus. $35
Contorni/Sides
Patate Arrosto- Roasted rosemary potatoes  $4
Vegetali Saltate- Sautéed Broccoli, Carrots, & Yellow Squash $5
Spinaci Saltati- Sautéed spinach $6
Asparago-  Grilled Asparagus $6
Pizza Tradizionali
Focaccina - Fresh Italian flat bread baked with Sorelle herbs and drizzled with extra virgin olive oil. $4 (Add a side of marinara. $3)
​
Margherita - Tomato sauce, mozzarella, & fresh basil. $12
Pepperoni- A classic combination of tomato sauce, mozzarella, & pepperoni. $14
Mozzarella e Pesto- Tomato sauce & pesto topped with fresh mozzarella. $14
Prosciutto– Tomato sauce, mozzarella, & thinly sliced imported prosciutto di Parma. $15
Salsiccia e ricotta con Spinaci – Mild Italian sausage with tomato sauce, spinach, ricotta & mozzarella cheese $15
KIDS MENU
Cheese Pizza - Tomato sauce & mozzarella pizza. $8
Add Pepperoni $11
Penne Burro E Parmigiano- Penne pasta with butter and parmesan cheese. $8
Add  chicken $10
​
Penne Meatballs- Homemade meatball pasta made with marinara sauce . $10
​
Penne Pomodoro– Penne in a tomato & basil sauce. $8
Add chicken $10
Chicken Milanese – Breaded & pounded chicken breast served with sauteed broccoli & carrots $11
Dolci
Home-made Tiramisu-Lady fingers soaked in espresso with mascarpone & shaved chocolate. $9
Affogato -Vanilla gelato topped off with fresh brewed espresso. $9
Limoncello Cake -Fluffy sponge cake, brushed with a limoncello syrup, filled with lemon curd. $9
​

*ADVISORY: CONSUMING RAW OR UNDERCOOKED FOOD SUCH AS MEAT, POULTRY, FISH, SHELFISH, AND EGGS MAY INCREASE YOUR RISK OF FOODBORNE ILLNES.

We charge a $20.00 Corkage fee and a $20.00 cakeage fee.

About the Business
Crispina, located in the heart of Vinings is a great Italian restaurant serving your favorite Neopolitan-style Italian dishes. Whether your taste caters to a pizza, pasta, or a protein dish. Crispina stands out from other Italian restaurants in Buckhead because they use fresh, never-frozen ingredients. This attention to detail combined with a casual atmosphere provides a unique dining experience for all to enjoy.

Frequently Asked Questions
Do you have vegan/vegetarian options?
Expand or collapse answer
We do have a delicious Vegan and Vegetarian menu to choose from. Please use the following link to find it:
https://www.carrabbas.com/nutrition
Do you have a Gluten Free menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes. Please visit our website at
www.carrabbas.com
and enter your city and state, or zip code in the search box provided. View a menu by clicking on "more info" and then "download a menu" and our Gluten Free offerings will be marked with GF.
Where can I add a missing visit for Dine Rewards?
Expand or collapse answer
Please visit
https://www.dine-rewards.com/
and click "Add a Visit." Enter the phone number associated with your Dine Rewards account and complete the form to have your credit manually applied. If you no longer have the receipt, please contact the restaurant directly and they will be happy to help you locate it.
Do you have outdoor seating?
Expand or collapse answer
Many of our restaurants have patio seating. Please contact your local Carrabba's to see if outdoor dining is available.
Do you have a Kids menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes, we do have a menu for kids 10 and under.
Click here to view the Kids menu
Give The Gift Of Carrabba's
BUY NOW
About Carrabba's Italian Grill
Atlanta, GA
Offering authentic Italian cuisine passed down from our founders' family recipes, Carrabba's Italian Grill® uses only the best ingredients to prepare fresh and handmade dishes cooked to order in a lively exhibition kitchen. Featuring the many tastes of Italy, guests can enjoy signature dishes, including Chicken Bryan, Grilled Steak and classic Italian Pasta dishes in a welcoming, contemporary atmosphere.
Managing Partner: Kristi Brown

Cuisine
LUNCH MENU
A wide selection of your favorites whether you are here for a quick bite or have a hearty appetite you will be sure to enjoy your meals with serafino’s.
DINNER MENU
Italian Cuisine at it’s finest. A selection of expertly crafted cuisine will have you coming back for more. You wont stop talking about us to your friends.
WINE SELECTIONS
At Serafino’s we specialize in pairing the perfect wine with your meal, We carry a wide variety of aged wines to accommodate most everyone’s taste.
TAKE OUT MENU
Fine selection of exquisite food and desserts for a complete dining experience. So indulge yourself and enjoy some of the areas finest cuisine.
Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs
may increase your risk of food-borne illness, especially if you have a medical condition.
Menu prices are subject to change without notice.
A 10% Gratuity will be charged on All To-Go Orders.
All Alcohol Sales are Final, No Refunds!

About the Business
Business owner information
Marcos A.
Business Owner
If you're craving genuine Italian food, you don't need to book a trip to Italy to find it. Instead, reserve a table at Roma Italiano Ristorante in Duluth, GA. We serve a variety of delicious, classic Italian dishes that are always made fresh.

You can enjoy all your favorite Italian foods at our restaurant, including pasta, pizza, soup and salads. Want to try something a little different? You can't go wrong with our seafood, veal and chicken entrees.

Contact our Italian restaurant today to make a reservation.

TO RENEW. INNOVATE. BEGIN AGAIN.
Novo Cucina introduces
a fresh new approach to eating Italian. Here, culinary tradition marries innovative casual, making it fun, easy and approachable to eat out – not to mention delicious. Artisanal pizza; classic pastas; plus salads and appetizers are but an order away, to pair with a refreshing list of Boutique wines and craft cocktails. An array of freshly spun gelato – plus an inventive menu of affogato offerings are available anytime.
Novo Cucina. A whole new way to eat Italian.

After traveling to Naples and throughout the entire region, owners Stephen de Haan & Greg Grant staged with the Italian Pizzaiolo
Maestros at Pizzeria Mattozzi and Pizzeria Da Attilio. This apprenticeship, along with studying in the Associazione Verace Pizza
Napolentana, allowed their passion for food to develop the skills to bring this beautifully executed Italian street food to Atlanta.

(678) 218 0888
OPENING HOURS
​
​
Mon, Tue,
Thu & Fri:    11:00am - 9:00pm
​
Wednesday:           CLOSED
​
​​Sat & Sun:   10:00 am - 9:00 pm​
​
Carts dim sum available till 3 PM, afterward Dimsum is served to order.
WELCOME
Welcome to Happy Valley Dim Sum and Asian Cuisine, a contemporary Chinese restaurant serving Hong Kong style Dim Sum, live seafood, and much more traditional cuisine that will keep you coming back for more.
If you want to experience the fun, bustling Hong Kong style dim sum cart served at your table, come and join our ever popular Sunday “Yum Cha” session. It has become a weekly staple for many of our loyal patrons.
Our Business Lunch Menu is designed in mind to complement your busy schedule without compromising the authenticity of our specialty dish.
We invite you to explore our website for more information!
CATERING
Where we have so much to celebrate!
Gather your colleagues, clients and friends and take this time
commemorate your special  moments while indulging in a scrumptious meal and luxurious cuisine awaits you in our custom made catering package.
​
WHERE ARE WE?
5495, Jimmy Carter Blvd, Norcross, GA 30093
Tel : (678) 218 0888

15 / 21

26

Restaurant Near Mercedes-Benz Stadium
Named by Eater as one of the essential downtown Atlanta restaurants, we transform premium Italian flour into handcrafted pastas and partner with local farms to create exceptional dishes from Spaghetti Al Pomodoro to Risotto Di Mais, and our creative artisan desserts like the beautiful Il Bergamotto.

New Fall Specials in Atlanta, GA
Chicken & Shrimp Spaghetti Carbonara
Spaghetti tossed in a rich bacon cream sauce with eggs, parmesan, romano cheese, and diced tomatoes, topped with bacon, wood-grilled chicken and shrimp
Order Now
New! Flavors for Fall
Savor cozy and refreshing fall drinks. New! Orchard Sangria – this cocktail blends Tuaca liqueur, Bonizio white wine, apple juice, blood orange and fig. Rosemary Lemon Drop – Absolut vodka, house-made rosemary honey syrup, and fresh sweet & sour. Fig Bourbon Sour – Elijah Craig bourbon, fig, rosemary honey syrup, and a splash of sweet & sour. Spirit-free versions also available.

Frequently Asked Questions
Do you have vegan/vegetarian options?
Expand or collapse answer
We do have a delicious Vegan and Vegetarian menu to choose from. Please use the following link to find it:
https://www.carrabbas.com/nutrition
Do you have a Gluten Free menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes. Please visit our website at
www.carrabbas.com
and enter your city and state, or zip code in the search box provided. View a menu by clicking on "more info" and then "download a menu" and our Gluten Free offerings will be marked with GF.
Where can I add a missing visit for Dine Rewards?
Expand or collapse answer
Please visit
https://www.dine-rewards.com/
and click "Add a Visit." Enter the phone number associated with your Dine Rewards account and complete the form to have your credit manually applied. If you no longer have the receipt, please contact the restaurant directly and they will be happy to help you locate it.
Do you have outdoor seating?
Expand or collapse answer
Many of our restaurants have patio seating. Please contact your local Carrabba's to see if outdoor dining is available.
Do you have a Kids menu?
Expand or collapse answer
Yes, we do have a menu for kids 10 and under.
Click here to view the Kids menu
Give The Gift Of Carrabba's
BUY NOW
About Carrabba's Italian Grill
Atlanta, GA
Offering authentic Italian cuisine passed down from our founders' family recipes, Carrabba's Italian Grill® uses only the best ingredients to prepare fresh and handmade dishes cooked to order in a lively exhibition kitchen. Featuring a wood-burning grill inspired by the many tastes of Italy, guests can enjoy signature dishes, including Chicken Bryan, Pollo Rosa Maria, Wood-Fire Grilled Steak and chops and classic Italian Pasta dishes in a welcoming, contemporary atmosphere.
Managing Partner: Juan Roldan

Welcome to Labellas
Authentic New York Pizza
Labella's Pizzeria
Taste a slice of New York!
Since 1992, Family owned and operated.
Rick and his family have been serving up authentic New York pizza to customers for over 30 years.
Labella's is a special place for it's amazing food but also where the community comes to gather to enjjoy neighbor's and good times.
The signature item on the menu is of course New York pizza. Labella's will not compromise on the ingredients and care in making every pie.
Come join us and experience the best local pizza available.

About Us

Home of the Snickerdoodle Pancake
Welcome to Baja Café!
Baja Café, located in sunny Tucson AZ, has two locations, one at 7002 E Broadway and one at 2970 N Campbell. We are a locally owned and operated full-service restaurant serving breakfast, brunch and lunch… traditional meals and many with a Southwestern flair. We love to offer guests dishes they will not find elsewhere!
We have grown to be known for our variety of eggs benedicts… we’ve come a long way from the classic benedict (which we offer!) to serving benedicts with a variety of bases, smoked (in house) meats, fresh veggies, and house made sauces.
Many of our guests come in for one of our mouth-watering, fluffy, made-from-scratch pancakes! Our classic cake is the Snickerdoodle! We also offer other varieties, from cinnamon roll to lemon-blueberry to strawberry. We have freshly made cinnamon rolls which we turn into our brioche French toast! And a favorite of many of our guests is our Liege Waffle. It is a different kind of waffle than the traditional kind many have had and a part of that is the Belgium pearl sugar which melts and caramelizes as the waffle cooks. It is truly something special.
Our huevos rancheros options are also favorites of our guests. They are packed with flavor with our crispy tostada shells, house made sauces (many with chiles straight out of Hatch!), and variety of house smoked and prepared meats, beans and veggies.
Don’t forget to try one of our amazing mimosas or tangy Bloody Mary’s!
Cheers and we hope to see you soon!
Our Hours
Broadway:
6am-2pm daily
Campbell:
6am-2pm daily
Our Menus

Broadway Location

Download Menu
Kid's Menu
Kid's Menu
Download Menu
*Our menu changes frequently. We do our best to update it online, but sometimes the menu in our restaurants vary slightly from the ones posted here. Prices are also subject to change.
About Us
While we are proud of the food our amazing team prepares every day, we also strive to offer our guests top notch service. Tucson, AZ is full of so many amazing and local restaurants… we are very honored to be a part of that magic! That being said, our guests have many great options so when they choose Baja Café we want to make sure they like it so much they will return and tell someone else about us! Those guests are the ones who have helped us grow
over the years.
Our serving team works to make sure our guests feel welcome and comfortable when they
come in and say thank you when folks leave. It is such a wonderful feeling to look across our dining areas and see so much diversity with our guests… dressed up, dressed down; old, young; families, single, couples; DMAFB military, students, nurses, U of A sports team members and
coaches; friends and family coming together to celebrate or share some quality time with one another. We want everyone to feel welcome every time they come.

Pets are also welcome at both locations! It is such a joy for all of us when our guests bring their furry friends in! Baja Café supports our area rescue organizations and the tireless work they do. Adopt Don’t Shop and don’t forget to spay/neuter!
Thank you to our amazing team and thank you Tucson and all those who visit and support us. You are the best!!!!
In The News
Top 100 Restaurants in 2025
- Baja Cafe is #34!
Top 25 Places to Eat in Tucson
- Baja Cafe is #2!
Restaurant Guru 2023
- Top Recomended Restaurant in Tucson
Praising Arizona
The south-western American city of Tucson is a gastronomic hotspot
SEE MORE
Gallery
Here are some examples of the delicious and creative dishes that we have served at Baja Cafe. Is your mouth watering yet?
Contact Us
We welcome questions, compliments (of course!), suggestions (you might see your idea on one of your menus!) and constructive criticism (while we strive to offer the best experience both with food and service, we know that sometimes things don’t work out the way we’d like. We appreciate the opportunity to correct any issues and make it right!)
Feel free to send us an email at
bajacafetucson@gmail.com.
Please fill out the contact form and we will respond within 48 hours.

Eat
Our food is inspired by traditional Italian cooking, where the best ingredients are the focus. Everything is made fresh daily, and we source local produce and humanely-raised meat from ecologically-friendly farms as much as possible.
View Menu
Bellina
Wine Bar
Bellina in Italian means beautiful and inviting. We hope you will instantly be immerse with that feeling when visiting us.
Alimentari
Market Café
Just like an Italian Alimentari (grocery shop), our Market is where you can find thoughtfully selected products imported from Italy, fresh pasta & sauces, freshly made anti pasti and locally sourced charcuterie and cheese. The Market Café is also where you can enjoy a casual menu of seasonally driven classic Italian dishes for diners to enjoy in the communal seating area of Ponce City Market or to take on-the-go.
Catering
Catering
Treat your guests to a delicious Italian meal, customizing a unique menu from freshly made paninis and salads to pastas and desserts. Available for pick up or delivery.

name: Varasano's Pizzeria
address: 2171 Peachtree Rd NE, Ste 100, Atlanta, GA 30309
raw_text:
Varasano's Pizzeria Menu
At Varasano's, we use only all natural ingredients and are one of the few pizzerias in the U.S. that make dough the old fashioned way, using only natural sourdough yeasts, fermented for several days. Because the pies are very thin, flash baked in just about 2 1/2 minutes, and use no dough conditioners, they are delicate and best enjoyed sparsely topped and without a knife and fork. Just pick it up, fold it and chow down!
Dinner 7 days, from 5:30pm
Brunch Sat & Sun from 11:30am
For Pickup Orders at our Peachtree Store Call:
404-352-8216
Or Click Below for Pickup or Delivery:
Find the World's
Best Pizzerias

Fresh from the sea. Fresh from the farms. Share a plate or three. Have a drink or three.
There is no beginning and end. No rules, except to eat what you want, and turn over your oyster shells when you’re done.
These menus are crafted for on premise dining only. The safety and satisfaction of our guests is our first priority at Beetlecat. Many of the items listed are temperature and time sensitive and therefore not well suited for delivery. As a result, we are NOT affiliated with any third party delivery services, including DoorDash, GrubHub, Postmates, etc., and will not allow to-go orders to be placed or picked up through third parties at this time. We look forward to having you dine with us soon!

9

Additional Information:
Complimentary valet is available daily. Please mention you are dining at Alma Cocina. WE HAVE COMPLIMENTARY VALET, OR IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO PARK ON YOUR OWN, WE VALIDATE IN THE TERMINUS PARKING DECK FO
About Us
Welcome to Atlanta’s most unique approach to contemporary Mexican and Latin American cuisine. Enjoy delicious dishes and fantastic service – there’s nothing else like it in Buckhead. Bright, fresh ingredients and regional influences shine through lunch tortas and taquito spreads, our seasonal guacamoles and salsas, and traditional chicken mole Oaxaca full of rich flavor. Sample from the most diverse tequila selection in the city and an inventive cocktail list while we deliver a destination dining experience to remember.

SAT & SUN … 10 AM – 3 PM
In Texas on a Saturday night
Everclear is added to the wine sometimes
Nachos, burritos, and tacos who knows
How it usually goes, it goes
Whoooah I love Sangria Wine…
MEZCAL WEEK CELEBRATION WITH DEL MAGUEY!
Join Superica’s Beverage Director Lara Creasy and Del Maguey’s Brand Ambassador Evan Meeker for an afternoon of mezcal tasting and education to celebrate Mezcal Week 2025.
Reserve your spot!
We will be featuring the winning cocktails from our Superica staff’s Mezcal Week cocktail competition, as well as offering a tasting flight of Del Maguey mezcals, both rare and beloved. There will also be delicious light bites specifically paired with mezcal, and free gifts to take home. It’s going to be an afternoon of fun, friends, and flavor!
GIVE THE GIFT OF SUPERICA
Order an e-gift card today!
RESERVATIONS AVAILABLE
Click here to join us with a reservation!
CHEF FORD FRY’S COOK BOOK!
Tex-Mex
is more than just a flavor-packed cookbook of tried and true recipes for comfort-food favorites like nachos, fajitas, and chili—it’s a way of life. It was born in the 1940s when traditional Northern Mexican cuisine collided with the robust flavors of Texas ranchers’ kitchens. Now, chef and restaurateur Ford Fry presents the definitive book on the topic with craveable recipes that are heavy on flavor and light on fuss. Peppered throughout are jump-off-the-page photographs, helpful ingredient explainers, playful histories, and important cooking tips. These melty, crispy, hot-as-heck classics include Dirty Breakfast Tacos, Grilled Shrimp Diablo, Cheese Enchiladas Con Chili Gravy, Sopaipillas with Local Honey, and more salsas than you can imagine. Pour yourself a Classic Margarita on the Rocks—don’t forget to salt the rim—and get ready to satisfy the rumble in your stomach.
Click here
to reserve your copy!

raw_text:
El Rey Del Taco – The best authentic Mexican food in Atlanta
Open Menu
Home
Menu
Our Story
Social
Contact Us
Home
Menu
Our Story
Social
Contact Us
Our Menu
Our Story
El Rey del Taco! We live by our name and strive to bring you the best authentic tacos in Atlanta. So, expect real Mexican food, nothing less than delicious. But don’t take our word for it, give us a try! Come visit us today and let us know how spicy our house-made salsa really is!
We have been making authentic Mexican food for the past 15 years, day and night. Family-owned, we work hard to provide you with a small piece of our heritage and hope to give you a bit of happiness when you try any of our signature authentic dishes.
We feel proud and happy that you took the time to visit us and are grateful to have you at our home. As the saying goes, “Mi casa es su casa.” We hope you enjoy your visit and hope to see you back soon.

Menu
Early each morning, we begin preparing our delicious Southern fare, fresh vegetables and made-from-scratch breads. Southern food represents family, and at Mary Mac’s, we welcome you with open arms and hope you feel at home each time you dine with us.

address: 2358 Hosea L Williams Dr NE, Atlanta, GA 30317
raw_text:

Skip to content

Locations

2358 HOSEA L WILLIAMS DR
Menu
Jobs
MENU
murray
2024-10-01T20:00:55+00:00
APPERTIVOS (Appetizers)
ARTICHOKE DIP – a creamy dip of chopped artichokes, olives, pimentos and garlic, served warm
Cup: $6.95
Bowl: $9.25
QUESO LA FONDA DIP – mildly spicy white cheese dip served warm, available with or without jalapeños
Cup: $6.95
Bowl: $9.25
GUACAMOLE DIP – fresh chopped avocados, tomatoes, onions, jalapenos and lime juice
Cup: $6.95
Bowl: $9.25
MADUROS – Traditional, fried sweet plantains .
Small: $4.95
Large: $9.50
TOSTONES – fried plantain chips served with garlic dipping sauce
Small: $4.95
Large: $9.50
PLATOS GRANDES – chips served with salsa, artichoke dip, Queso La Fonda, guacamole and sour cream
$17.25
Chips & Salsa included with any entree or sold separately
ENSALADS Y SOPAS (Salads and Soups)
ENSALADA de CASA – house salad with fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, mixed greens, onions, black olives and bell peppers with vinaigrette dressing
$8.50
ENSALADA PESCADO – your choice of grilled salmon or tilapia served over mixed greens with grilled corn, diced tomatoes and onions. Served with a creamy mustard vinaigrette
$12.95
ENSALADA de los ANDES – a spinach and iceberg salad topped with fresh tomatoes, red onions, cilantro, jalapenos and warm black beans with a creamy Cuban dressing
$10.75
With grilled chicken breast or grilled pork
$13.75
ENSALADA CON POLLO – grilled boneless breast of chicken over mixed greens, fresh tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, bell peppers and tortilla strips, with vinaigrette dressing
$13.75
GRILLED PORK and MANGO SALAD – tender strips of fresh pork, marinated in a mango vinaigrette, grilled with fresh mango, red and green peppers, tomatoes and red onions served over a bed of mixed field greens, with a creamy mango vinaigrette
$12.95
Also available with grilled chicken breast instead of pork $13.95
SOPA ESPECIAL – seasonal, freshly made soup. Ask your server for today’s selection. Available by the bowl or cup.
Ask your server for prices
SOPA DE POLLO – chicken soup with rice, tomatoes, green onions and cilantro, served with jalapeños and lime on the side
Cup: $5.75
Bowl: $7.50
ARROZ CON FRIJOLES – yellow rice and black beans
$7.25
BOCADILLOS CUBANOS (Cuban Sandwiches)
All Bocadillos are served Flattened and grilled with yellow rice and black beans
BOCADILLO LATINO – roast pork, ham, Swiss cheese, mustard, mayonnaise, mojo sauce and pickles on Cuban bread
$14.95
REUBEN CUBANO – grilled boneless breast of chicken, Swiss cheese, Cuban coleslaw, pickles and Cuban dressing on Cuban bread
$14.95
BOCADILLO CON BISTEC – strips of marinated Angus beef, Monterey jack cheese, grilled onions, peppers, tomatoes and Cuban dressing on Cuban bread
$15.25
BOCADILLO CON CHORIZO – sautéed smoked Spanish sausage, roasted red peppers, tomatoes, onions, Monterey jack cheese, Cuban dressing and brown mustard on Cuban bread
$15.25
BOCADILLO VEGETARIANO – grilled vegetables, tomatoes, cheddar, Monterey jack cheese, and Cuban dressing on Cuban bread
$13.25
DE LA PARRILLA CUBANA (From the Cuban Grill)
All Parrilla entrees are grilled over hickory wood and served with yellow rice, black beans, chips & salsa
BISTEC A LA PARRILLA – marinated seasoned ribeye steak with tomato criolla sauce on the side
$22.75
CHULETAS DE CERDO A LA PARRILLA – two center cut pork chops with tomato criolla sauce on the side
$16.50
POLLO A LA PARRILLA – a half chicken, marinated in mojo and glazed
$15.50
VERDURAS A LA PARRILLA – grilled vegetable kabobs with squash, mushrooms, potatoes, tomatoes, green peppers and onions
$12.50
PESCADO A LA PARRILLA – ask your server about today’s fresh fish
$19.75
AL LADO (On the Side)
FRIJOLES (black beans): $3.95
ARROZ (yellow rice): $3.50
JALAPEÑOS: $1.95
SOUR CREAM: $1.95
GUACAMOLE (small side): $2.25
CHIPS (small): $3.25
CHIPS (large) : $4.95
SALSA (small): $2.75
SALSA (large): $5.25
AL LADO (On the Side)
CHIPS & SALSA To Go
(small): $3.50 (large): $6.95
REFRIED PINTO BEANS: $3.95
PAN (Garlic Bread): $1.95
TORTILLAS (2): $1.95
SIDE SALAD: $3.50
SIDE GRILLED VEGGIES: $4.95
LETTUCE & TOMATOES: $3.95
TRADICION DE ESPANA (A Spanish Tradition) Our House Specialty
PAELLA – yellow rice cooked in a cast iron skillet with calamari, shrimp, baked chicken,
chorizo (Spanish Sausage), green peppers, onions, pimentos and clam juice
PARA UNO (for one): $15.50
PARA DOS (for two): $30.50
PAELLA del MAR – yellow rice cooked with shrimp, calamari, salmon, sea scallops,
mussels, green peppers, onions, pimentos, garlic and clam juice
PARA UNO (for one): $18.50
PARA DOS (for two): $35.95
PAELLA CON VERDURAS – yellow rice cooked with eggplant, artichoke hearts, peas, squash, mushrooms, black olives, onions and peppers, seasoned with curry
PARA UNO (for one): $14.25
PARA DOS (for two): $27.95
ARROZ CON POLLO – a half chicken cooked with yellow rice, white wine, paprika, tomatoes, onions, peppers, pimentos and cilantro $17.50
ROPA VIEJA – traditional Cuban food featuring thin strands of shredded beef cooked in a creole tomato sauce with onions and bell peppers. Served with Cuban bread, yellow rice and beans $15.25
ALL ENTREES SERVED WITH CHIPS AND SALSA. OUR YELLOW RICE AND BLACK BEANS ARE VEGETARIAN.
UN SABOR MEXICANO (A Taste of Mexico)
All quesadillas are made with 10” flour tortillas filled with cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese.
Yellow rice and black beans are served on the side (Black Bean Quesadilla – Rice only, on the side)
QUESADILLAS
CON QUESO – with cheese only
$11.75
CON POLLO – with cheese and chicken cooked in tomatoes and onions
$13.95
CON FRIJOLES – with cheese, black beans and sour cream
$11.75
CON BISTEC – with cheese, strips of Angus beef, sour cream, onions and peppers
$14.75
CON MAIZ Y JALAPEÑOS – with cheese, corn, jalapeños, sour cream and green onion
$13.25
CON CAMARONES – with cheese and sautéed fresh shrimp
$14.25
CON CHORIZO – with cheese, Spanish sausage, roasted red peppers and onions
$14.25
CON VERDURAS – with cheese and assorted grilled vegetables
$13.25
CON ESPINACA – with cheese, fresh spinach and red onions
$13.50
CON ESPINACA Y CAMARONES – with cheese, fresh spinach, red onions and fresh sautéed shrimp
$14.95
CON CARNITAS – with cheese and Pork Carnitas, grilled onion, peppers and sour cream
$14.75
CON HONGOS – with cheese and seasoned, grilled fresh mushrooms
$13.50
TACOS
FISH TACOS – two soft tacos with your choice of grilled, seasoned tilapia or fresh salmon, lettuce, tomatoes and a sour cream jalapeño sauce
Two: $13.75
Three: $17.50
CHICKEN, BEEF, or PORK TACOS – two soft tacos with your choice of seasoned chicken or marinated beef strips or Pork Carnitas with lettuce, tomatoes, cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese and a chipotle taco sauce
Select one meat only per order
Two : $13.75
Three: $17.50
VEGGIE TACOS – two soft tacos filled with grilled squash, mushrooms, broccoli, onions, peppers and pimentos, with fresh spinach, lettuce, tomatoes, cheddar and Monterey jack cheese and a mojo-mustard sauce
Two: $12.50
Three: $14.95
SHRIMP TACOS – two soft tacos with grilled shrimp, lettuce, tomatoes and sour cream-jalapeño sauce
Two: $15.25
Three .. $18.95
BURRITOS
FISH BURRITO – marinated, grilled salmon or tilapia and grilled corn, with lettuce, tomatoes, onions and a sour cream-jalapeño sauce rolled in a warm flour tortilla
$14.75
CHICKEN, BEEF, or PORK BURRITO – seasoned chicken cooked in tomatoes and onions or shredded beef or Pork Carnitas, refried pinto beans, cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, onions and sour cream, rolled in a warm flour tortilla
$14.75
VEGGIE BURRITO – grilled squash, mushrooms, broccoli, onions, peppers, pimentos and artichoke hearts with a fresh spinach, lettuce, tomatoes, cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, with a mojo-mustard sauce, rolled in a warm flour tortilla
$13.25
SHRIMP BURRITO – grilled fresh shrimp, lettuce, tomatoes, onions and a sour cream-jalapeno sauce, rolled in a large warm flour tortilla
$15.25
ENCHILADAS
FISH ENCHILADAS – white corn tortillas filled with your choice of grilled salmon or tilapia covered with a chipotle sauce and ancho chili pepper tomato sauce, topped with cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, queso blanco and cilantro
Two: $13.75
Three : $15.95
CHICKEN, BEEF or PORK ENCHILADAS – white corn tortillas filled with seasoned chicken cooked in tomatoes and onions or shredded beef or Pork Carnitas and topped with a chipotle ancho chili pepper tomato sauce, cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, queso blanco and cilantro
Select one meat only per order
Two: $13.75
Three: $15.95
VEGGIE ENCHILADAS – white corn tortillas filled with grilled squash, mushrooms, broccoli, onion, peppers, pimentos and fresh spinach, covered with a chipotle and ancho chili pepper tomato sauce, topped with cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, queso blanco and cilantro
Two: $13.25
Three: $14.95
CHEESE ENCHILADAS – White corn tortillas filled with melted cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, covered with a chipotle and ancho chili pepper tomato sauce, topped with cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese, queso blanco and cilantro
Two: $12.95
Three: $14.95
ALSO AVAILABLE WITH GREEN TOMATILLO SAUCE
ALL THE ABOVE ENTREES ARE SERVED WITH YELLOW RICE AND BLACK BEANS, CHIPS AND SALSA
VISA – MasterCard – American Express – Discover
Credit cards must be presented by cardholder only (magnetic stripe only)
NO SUBSTITUTIONS
Due to the nature of our recipes and kitchen operations, we cannot safely alter dishes to accommodate allergies.
We reserve the right to limit separate checks • Special orders are non-refundable • All prices subject to change
Not responsible for acts of Mother Nature when seated outdoors

Experience Habitat
Habitat is a rooftop kitchen and bar that offers beautiful sunsets with modern Mexican cuisine and craft cocktails.
​
Join us for an unforgettable journey through Tulum's best kept secrets.
21+ only. Valid physical ID required for entry.
MENU
Nuestra Historia
OUR STORY
Launched in Spring of 2021, Habitat is a premier and authentic Restaurant + Bar proudly serving the Atlanta-Buckhead area with the mission of providing a Yucatán Peninsula inspired oasis worth of delicious small plates and crafted cocktails.
DINE IN OR TAKE AWAY

pm - 10 pm

Menu

MENU
murray
2024-10-01T20:00:55+00:00
APPERTIVOS (Appetizers)
ARTICHOKE DIP – a creamy dip of chopped artichokes, olives, pimentos and garlic, served warm
Cup: $6.95
Bowl: $9.25
QUESO LA FONDA DIP – mildly spicy white cheese dip served warm, available with or without jalapeños
Cup: $6.95
Bowl: $9.25
GUACAMOLE DIP – fresh chopped avocados, tomatoes, onions, jalapenos and lime juice
Cup: $6.95
Bowl: $9.25
MADUROS – Traditional, fried sweet plantains .
Small: $4.95
Large: $9.50
TOSTONES – fried plantain chips served with garlic dipping sauce
Small: $4.95
Large: $9.50
PLATOS GRANDES – chips served with salsa, artichoke dip, Queso La Fonda, guacamole and sour cream
$17.25
Chips & Salsa included with any entree or sold separately
ENSALADS Y SOPAS (Salads and Soups)
ENSALADA de CASA – house salad with fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, mixed greens, onions, black olives and bell peppers with vinaigrette dressing
$8.50
ENSALADA PESCADO – your choice of grilled salmon or tilapia served over mixed greens with grilled corn, diced tomatoes and onions. Served with a creamy mustard vinaigrette
$12.95
ENSALADA de los ANDES – a spinach and iceberg salad topped with fresh tomatoes, red onions, cilantro, jalapenos and warm black beans with a creamy Cuban dressing
$10.75
With grilled chicken breast or grilled pork
$13.75
ENSALADA CON POLLO – grilled boneless breast of chicken over mixed greens, fresh tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, bell peppers and tortilla strips, with vinaigrette dressing
$13.75
GRILLED PORK and MANGO SALAD – tender strips of fresh pork, marinated in a mango vinaigrette, grilled with fresh mango, red and green peppers, tomatoes and red onions served over a bed of mixed field greens, with a creamy mango vinaigrette
$12.95
Also available with grilled chicken breast instead of pork $13.95
SOPA ESPECIAL – seasonal, freshly made soup. Ask your server for today’s selection. Available by the bowl or cup.
Ask your server for prices
SOPA DE POLLO – chicken soup with rice, tomatoes, green onions and cilantro, served with jalapeños and lime on the side
Cup: $5.75
Bowl: $7.50
ARROZ CON FRIJOLES – yellow rice and black beans
$7.25
BOCADILLOS CUBANOS (Cuban Sandwiches)
All Bocadillos are served Flattened and grilled with yellow rice and black beans
BOCADILLO LATINO – roast pork, ham, Swiss cheese, mustard, mayonnaise, mojo sauce and pickles on Cuban bread
$14.95
REUBEN CUBANO – grilled boneless breast of chicken, Swiss cheese, Cuban coleslaw, pickles and Cuban dressing on Cuban bread
$14.95
BOCADILLO CON BISTEC – strips of marinated Angus beef, Monterey jack cheese, grilled onions, peppers, tomatoes and Cuban dressing on Cuban bread
$15.25
BOCADILLO CON CHORIZO – sautéed smoked Spanish sausage, roasted red peppers, tomatoes, onions, Monterey jack cheese, Cuban dressing and brown mustard on Cuban bread
$15.25
BOCADILLO VEGETARIANO – grilled vegetables, tomatoes, cheddar, Monterey jack cheese, and Cuban dressing on Cuban bread
$13.25
DE LA PARRILLA CUBANA (From the Cuban Grill)
All Parrilla entrees are grilled over hickory wood and served with yellow rice, black beans, chips & salsa
BISTEC A LA PARRILLA – marinated seasoned ribeye steak with tomato criolla sauce on the side
$22.75
CHULETAS DE CERDO A LA PARRILLA – two center cut pork chops with tomato criolla sauce on the side
$16.50
POLLO A LA PARRILLA – a half chicken, marinated in mojo and glazed
$15.50
VERDURAS A LA PARRILLA – grilled vegetable kabobs with squash, mushrooms, potatoes, tomatoes, green peppers and onions
$12.50
PESCADO A LA PARRILLA – ask your server about today’s fresh fish
$19.75
AL LADO (On the Side)
FRIJOLES (black beans): $3.95
ARROZ (yellow rice): $3.50
JALAPEÑOS: $1.95
SOUR CREAM: $1.95
GUACAMOLE (small side): $2.25
CHIPS (small): $3.25
CHIPS (large) : $4.95
SALSA (small): $2.75
SALSA (large): $5.25
AL LADO (On the Side)
CHIPS & SALSA To Go
(small): $3.50 (large): $6.95
REFRIED PINTO BEANS: $3.95
PAN (Garlic Bread): $1.95
TORTILLAS (2): $1.95
SIDE SALAD: $3.50
SIDE GRILLED VEGGIES: $4.95
LETTUCE & TOMATOES: $3.95
TRADICION DE ESPANA (A Spanish Tradition) Our House Specialty
PAELLA – yellow rice cooked in a cast iron skillet with calamari, shrimp, baked chicken,
chorizo (Spanish Sausage), green peppers, onions, pimentos and clam juice
PARA UNO (for one): $15.50
PARA DOS (for two): $30.50
PAELLA del MAR – yellow rice cooked with shrimp, calamari, salmon, sea scallops,
mussels, green peppers, onions, pimentos, garlic and clam juice
PARA UNO (for one): $18.50
PARA DOS (for two): $35.95
PAELLA CON VERDURAS – yellow rice cooked with eggplant, artichoke hearts, peas, squash, mushrooms, black olives, onions and peppers, seasoned with curry
PARA UNO (for one): $14.25
PARA DOS (for two): $27.95
ARROZ CON POLLO – a half chicken cooked with yellow rice, white wine, paprika, tomatoes, onions, peppers, pimentos and cilantro $17.50
ROPA VIEJA – traditional Cuban food featuring thin strands of shredded beef cooked in a creole tomato sauce with onions and bell peppers. Served with Cuban bread, yellow rice and beans $15.25
ALL ENTREES SERVED WITH CHIPS AND SALSA. OUR YELLOW RICE AND BLACK BEANS ARE VEGETARIAN.
UN SABOR MEXICANO (A Taste of Mexico)
All quesadillas are made with 10” flour tortillas filled with cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese.
Yellow rice and black beans are served on the side (Black Bean Quesadilla – Rice only, on the side)
QUESADILLAS
CON QUESO – with cheese only
$11.75
CON POLLO – with cheese and chicken cooked in tomatoes and onions
$13.95
CON FRIJOLES – with cheese, black beans and sour cream
$11.75
CON BISTEC – with cheese, strips of Angus beef, sour cream, onions and peppers
$14.75
CON MAIZ Y JALAPEÑOS – with cheese, corn, jalapeños, sour cream and green onion
$13.25
CON CAMARONES – with cheese and sautéed fresh shrimp
$14.25
CON CHORIZO – with cheese, Spanish sausage, roasted red peppers and onions
$14.25
CON VERDURAS – with cheese and assorted grilled vegetables
$13.25
CON ESPINACA – with cheese, fresh spinach and red onions
$13.50
CON ESPINACA Y CAMARONES – with cheese, fresh spinach, red onions and fresh sautéed shrimp
$14.95
CON CARNITAS – with cheese and Pork Carnitas, grilled onion, peppers and sour cream
$14.75
CON HONGOS – with cheese and seasoned, grilled fresh mushrooms
$13.50
TACOS
FISH TACOS – two soft tacos with your choice of grilled, seasoned tilapia or fresh salmon, lettuce, tomatoes and a sour cream jalapeño sauce
Two: $13.75
Three: $17.50
CHICKEN, BEEF, or PORK TACOS – two soft tacos with your choice of seasoned chicken or marinated beef strips or Pork Carnitas with lettuce, tomatoes, cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese and a chipotle taco sauce
Select one meat only per order
Two : $13.75
Three: $17.50
VEGGIE TACOS – two soft tacos filled with grilled squash, mushrooms, broccoli, onions, peppers and pimentos, with fresh spinach, lettuce, tomatoes, cheddar and Monterey jack cheese and a mojo-mustard sauce
Two: $12.50
Three: $14.95
SHRIMP TACOS – two soft tacos with grilled shrimp, lettuce, tomatoes and sour cream-jalapeño sauce
Two: $15.25
Three .. $18.95
BURRITOS
FISH BURRITO – marinated, grilled salmon or tilapia and grilled corn, with lettuce, tomatoes, onions and a sour cream-jalapeño sauce rolled in a warm flour tortilla
$14.75
CHICKEN, BEEF, or PORK BURRITO – seasoned chicken cooked in tomatoes and onions or shredded beef or Pork Carnitas, refried pinto beans, cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, onions and sour cream, rolled in a warm flour tortilla
$14.75
VEGGIE BURRITO – grilled squash, mushrooms, broccoli, onions, peppers, pimentos and artichoke hearts with a fresh spinach, lettuce, tomatoes, cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, with a mojo-mustard sauce, rolled in a warm flour tortilla
$13.25
SHRIMP BURRITO – grilled fresh shrimp, lettuce, tomatoes, onions and a sour cream-jalapeno sauce, rolled in a large warm flour tortilla
$15.25
ENCHILADAS
FISH ENCHILADAS – white corn tortillas filled with your choice of grilled salmon or tilapia covered with a chipotle sauce and ancho chili pepper tomato sauce, topped with cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, queso blanco and cilantro
Two: $13.75
Three : $15.95
CHICKEN, BEEF or PORK ENCHILADAS – white corn tortillas filled with seasoned chicken cooked in tomatoes and onions or shredded beef or Pork Carnitas and topped with a chipotle ancho chili pepper tomato sauce, cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, queso blanco and cilantro
Select one meat only per order
Two: $13.75
Three: $15.95
VEGGIE ENCHILADAS – white corn tortillas filled with grilled squash, mushrooms, broccoli, onion, peppers, pimentos and fresh spinach, covered with a chipotle and ancho chili pepper tomato sauce, topped with cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, queso blanco and cilantro
Two: $13.25
Three: $14.95
CHEESE ENCHILADAS – White corn tortillas filled with melted cheddar and Monterey jack cheese, covered with a chipotle and ancho chili pepper tomato sauce, topped with cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese, queso blanco and cilantro
Two: $12.95
Three: $14.95
ALSO AVAILABLE WITH GREEN TOMATILLO SAUCE
ALL THE ABOVE ENTREES ARE SERVED WITH YELLOW RICE AND BLACK BEANS, CHIPS AND SALSA
VISA – MasterCard – American Express – Discover
Credit cards must be presented by cardholder only (magnetic stripe only)
NO SUBSTITUTIONS
Due to the nature of our recipes and kitchen operations, we cannot safely alter dishes to accommodate allergies.
We reserve the right to limit separate checks • Special orders are non-refundable • All prices subject to change
Not responsible for acts of Mother Nature when seated outdoors

name: Taquería La Oaxaqueña
raw_text:
Taqueria La Oaxaqueña | The Best Mexican Food in Atlanta!
MENU
ABOUT
LOCATION
CONTACT
Select Page
MENU
TACOS
TLAYUDAS
SPECIALTIES
BREAKFAST
ANTOJITOS
TAMALES
AMERICAN / SALADS
DESSERTS
TORTAS
SOUPS
LUNCH SPECIALS
DRINKS
ABOUT US
At age 15, Rosalia Ruiz started selling traditional food an snacks in her home state of origin in Oaxaca, Mexico. In 1995, she had the opportunity to travel to the USA with her husband, Oscar Arteaga, arriving at Dekalb County in Georgia. During a visit to a local flea market, Rosalia came up with the idea of selling traditional Mexican food. With very few resources and a very basic grasp of the English language, they began to sell tamales.
After two years, Rosalia and Oscar saved up enough money to buy a food truck, which was located on North Harston Rd, at Stone Mountain. After years of struggles and perseverance, they were able to expand their business to a brick and mortar location in Clayton County on 6768 Tara Boulevard.  For five years, “Taqueria La Oaxaqueña” operated at that location, where they earned the loyalty of their clients with their delicious traditional Oaxacan food.
As the clientele grew, so did the need for a bigger space, so they moved to the current location at 605 Mt Zion Rd in Jonesboro. Their menu includes Oaxacan Mole, Tlayudas, Quesillo, Tacos, Burritos, Tamales, Seafood, and many more traditional Mexican dishes.
Taqueria La Oaxaqueña has received awards from the Atlanta Journal-Constitution and The Zagat. It is also included in the list of top 50 restaurants in Atlanta by Atlanta Magazine and has been voted best Mexican Restaurant in Atlanta by Creative Loafing.

About the Business
At Torchy's Atlanta West Midtown, we're all about one thing: damn good food. We don't cut corners--we source top-quality ingredients and cook everything to order so we can serve up the best taco, bowl, or salad you've ever tasted. Whether you're craving something indulgent or trying to be good (no judgment here), we've got something on the menu that's sure to hit the spot for everyone. Come hungry, leave happy. Find us at 1055 Howell Mill Road, right here in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: The Border Mexican Restaurant
raw_text:
The Border Mexican Restaurant - Smyrna GA
Home
Menu
Order Now
¡Bienvenidos Amigos!
Welcome to The Border, where tradition meets taste. At The Border Mexican Restaurant, we take pride in offering you an authentic and pleasurable dining experience. Whether you’re craving traditional Mexican dishes or exploring new flavors, our menu is perfect to feed the family. We’re honored to have you visit our website, and we invite you to join us in celebrating the rich culinary heritage of Mexico
Order Food To Go
¡Bienvenidos Amigos!
Welcome to The Border, where tradition meets taste. At The Border Mexican Restaurant, we take pride in offering our customers an authentic and pleasurable dining experience. Whether you’re craving traditional Mexican dishes or exploring new flavors, our menu is perfect to feed the family. We’re honored to have you visit our website, and we invite you to join us in celebrating the rich culinary heritage of Mexico.
Got questions?
Reach out to us anytime—we’re here to help!
Order Food To Go
Our Passion for Authentic Mexican Cuisine
Our culinary adventure is a reflection of our commitment to authenticity. We believe that the essence of Mexican cuisine lies in the use of fresh, locally sourced ingredients, time-honored recipes, and a dedication to preserving the rich culinary heritage of Mexico. Our chefs, who are not just culinary experts but also keepers of tradition, pour their hearts into each dish they create.
House Rules
In order to serve you efficiently and not compromise quality, we have a
no substitution policy.
We are happy to accommodate any dietary restrictions as best as we can.
For parties of 5 or more, we kindly ask to checkout on one ticket.
Drink refills are for customers dining in only.
All take-out orders have a service fee of 50¢
In order to serve you, please have your picture ID ready when ordering any alcoholic beverage. NO EXCEPTIONS.
We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone
Click to See Our Menu

authentic mexican food
Rooted in Tradition, Inspired by Innovation
At La Industria Mexican Grill, weâre proud to be a family-owned restaurant bringing the heart of Mexico to your table. Our kitchen blends time-honored recipes passed down through generations with bold, modern twists that surprise and delight. From sizzling fajitas to crispy quesabirrias and flavorful camarones cucaracha, every dish tells a story of heritage, creativity, and love for good food. Come join us for a dining experience that feels like homeâbut tastes like something new.

About the Business
La Viuda Negra is an elegant and contemporary Mexican restaurant in Duluth, GA, where tradition and innovation meet in every dish. Our kitchen blends authentic recipes with a modern twist: gourmet tacos, premium cuts, fresh ceviches, and specialties that celebrate the vibrant flavors of Mexico.

Our bar features handcrafted margaritas, exclusive mezcals, creative cocktails, and ice-cold Mexican beers — the perfect pairing for every bite.

With a sophisticated yet inviting atmosphere, ideal for special dinners or gatherings with friends, La Viuda Negra invites you to enjoy a dining experience that delights all the senses. Come savor Mexico in style!

Reviews
“Best Indian food! Our family has friends in Udaipur that we visit often. Aamar’s food makes us feel like we’re sitting at our friend, Samvit’s kitchen table with him. Fills our hearts & tummies with love!”
– Asha
“Phenomenal food, the coconut soup is the best thing I’ve ever let my palate experience! The Tandoori wings took me out as well! Slammin food! Fast delivery!”
– Candace
“Aamar is one of the best spots in Atlanta for old-school Indian takeaway. We were highly impressed on a recent delivery order after a night out. We both went classic and ordered paneer but tikka, mild for her, medium spicy for mine, and I appreciated the spice personalization option. Both were great, and paired perfectly with the tandoori naan. I will definitely be ordering again when in the mood for real-deal Indian.”
– Jordan
READ MORE
About Us
Aamar Indian Cuisine offers delicious Indian food for dine-in, takeout, and delivery in Atlanta, GA.
Aamar is a cornerstone in the Atlanta community and has been recognized for its outstanding Indian food, excellent service and friendly staff.
Our Indian restaurant is known for its modern interpretation of classic dishes and its insistence on only using high quality fresh ingredients.

About Us
At Cafe Bombay, we introduce a new world of the finest Indian cuisine. We emphasize quality and freshly cooked food prepared with the use of a clay oven (Tandoor) and the Indian Wok (Karahi), all to create a harmony of subtle flavors, tastes, and colors. Dine here with a group of friends or family so that you can share a wider selection of delicious appetizers, rice dishes, breads, fabulous entrees and desserts. Our elegant environment is also designed to create a warm and inviting dining place which offers the ideal getaway for business lunch or relaxed dining experience. We hope you enjoy the ambiance, the food, and the service of our establishment.

Best Indian Food | Curry Up Now Menu
California is home to the largest population of Indians outside of India and our style of cooking is ~9,000 miles and ~125 years in the making. Traditional rituals with flavor-forward flair. Firmly familiar to some and fantastically fun for all. Indian at heart while Californian in spirit. This is your Auntie’s tikka wrapped in your Tía’s burrito...Bombay tandoori riding with Bay Area burgers...New Delhi naan if pizza-fied by SoCal surfers. You’ve had thalis and kathis and biryanis in the past. But this is Curry Up Now: the hyphenated hero of the Indo-Californian kitchen, remixing street food from the Land of Spices with culinary classics from the Land of Dreams.

Best Indian Food | Curry Up Now Menu
California is home to the largest population of Indians outside of India and our style of cooking is ~9,000 miles and ~125 years in the making. Traditional rituals with flavor-forward flair. Firmly familiar to some and fantastically fun for all. Indian at heart while Californian in spirit. This is your Auntie’s tikka wrapped in your Tía’s burrito...Bombay tandoori riding with Bay Area burgers...New Delhi naan if pizza-fied by SoCal surfers. You’ve had thalis and kathis and biryanis in the past. But this is Curry Up Now: the hyphenated hero of the Indo-Californian kitchen, remixing street food from the Land of Spices with culinary classics from the Land of Dreams.

Malabar Parotta (2 No.s)
A soft and flaky flatbread hailing from the coastal region of Malabar, in South India. Made with a blend of refined flour and oil, the parotta is expertly crafted to create its signature texture, perfect for soaking up the flavors of your favorite gravies and curries. Whether enjoyed with a spicy chicken curry or a rich, flavorful mutton masala, this parotta is a staple of South Indian cuisine and is sure to satisfy your cravings. Serve hot for the ultimate experience and taste the soft, flaky goodness of Malabar Parotta."

Masala Uttapam
A traditional South Indian dish made with a fermented batter of rice and lentils. The batter is spread into a thick, pancake-like shape and topped with a variety of ingredients such as onions, tomatoes, peppers, and spices. The uttapam is then gently cooked until the toppings are tender and the bottom is crispy and golden brown. Served hot and garnished with fresh cilantro, this nutritious and delicious dish is a must-try for anyone looking to sample authentic South Indian cuisine. Whether enjoyed for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, uttapam is a treat for the senses and is sure to leave you feeling satisfied."
$ 13.99
Plain Uttapam
A traditional South Indian dish made with a fermented batter of rice and lentils. The batter is spread into a thick, pancake-like shape, uttapam is a treat for the senses and is sure to leave you feeling satisfied."

South Indian
Egg Kothu Parotta
A delicious and satisfying dish that combines the soft and flaky parotta with scrambled eggs and an assortment of spices. The eggs are expertly cooked and blended with the shredded parotta, creating a unique and flavorful mix. Perfect for a hearty breakfast or a filling dinner, this dish is a real crowd-pleaser and is sure to leave you feeling satisfied. Served hot and garnished with fresh cilantro, this egg kottu parotta is a true taste of South Indian cuisine."
$ 15.99
Chicken Kothu Parotta
A mouth-watering South Indian specialty made with juicy, tender chunks of chicken and crispy, shredded parotta. The succulent chicken and fluffy parotta are stir-fried with a blend of aromatic spices, creating a tantalizing flavor that is sure to delight your taste buds. Served hot and garnished with a squeeze of lemon, this dish is the perfect balance of juicy, tender chicken and crispy, flaky parotta. Enjoy as a filling lunch or dinner, and experience the delicious taste of South Indian cuisine!"

raw_text:

Join the Goto-Place Newsletter
Sabri Kabab House Menu
Overview
Photos
Menu
Reviews
Location
Price Range
$10–20
Welcome to
Sabri Kabab House
, a gem nestled in Norcross, GA, famous for its authentic Pakistani flavors that transport you straight to the heart of South Asia. This culinary haven boasts a diverse menu, offering everything from tantalizing appetizers like
Chicken Samosas
and
Chicken 65
to a selection of smoky grilled delights, including the mouthwatering
Malai Chicken Boti
and
Seekh Kabab
.
For those craving hearty entrées, you can't miss the
Chicken Korma
or the tender
Nihari
, known for their rich, comforting flavors. The restaurant also serves up renowned dishes like
Butter Chicken
, which has earned rave reviews as a must-try. Coupled with warm, fluffy naan and perfect portions, Sabri Kabab House is sure to satisfy every palate. Whether you're a seasoned fan of Pakistani cuisine or a curious newcomer, each dish promises a delightful experience that leaves you craving more!

INDIA BHAVAN Indian Eatery Alpharetta Menu (Updated September 2025)
Welcome to
INDIA BHAVAN Indian Eatery
, a hidden gem nestled in Alpharetta, GA, serving authentic Indian cuisine that tantalizes the senses. Located at 670 N Main St, this eatery is not just a restaurant; it's a culinary adventure waiting to unfold.
The menu is a delightful fusion of traditional and contemporary Indian dishes. The
TIFFINS
section invites you to start with sharing plates such as the Idli Vada Combo or indulge in a Ghee Karam Dosa, each bursting with flavors. For those craving something heartier, the
STREET STYLE
offerings include Veg Cheese Grilled Sandwiches and Guntur Peri Peri Fries, perfectly capturing the essence of Indian street food.
But save room for dessert! The
DESSERTS
menu features traditional treats like Gulab Jamun and creamy Kulfi, ensuring a sweet finish to your meal. Customers rave about the
authentic flavors
and generous portions, with dishes like the Chettinad Chicken and Papdi Chaat receiving high praise for their vibrant spices and freshness.
Step into
INDIA BHAVAN
for a cozy atmosphere complemented by top-tier hospitality that will make you feel right at home. It's not just dining; it's an experience that keeps you coming back for more!
BEVERAGES
MANGO LASSI
A delicious, creamy drink with mango and yogurt
$8.49

$7.49

$10.99
SEV PURI
Crispy fried flour discs topped with onion, tomato, raw mango, herbs and spices served with chilli chutney and sweet tamarind sauce. Experience spicy, tangy, savoury, salty and crunchy flavours in your mouth in each bite!
$10.99
DAHI PURI
Crispy, fried, hollow dough balls filled with potatoes and sweet and sour sauces, topped with yoghurt, sev and garnished with blended spices. A classic Bombay street-side snack!
$10.99
BHEL
A roadside stall snack, often served in paper cones! A mixture of puffed rice, potatoes, onion, sev, raw mango pieces, green chilli chutney and sweet tamarind sauce
$9.99
DAHI WADA
Deep fried lentil fritters dunked in creamy yogurt, topped with pomegranite and sweet and spicy sauces. These are soft and tender and just melt in the mouth! A very popular snack across various cities in India. A must-try!
$10.99
PAPDI CHAAT
Crispy, fried, flat dough combined with potatoes, sweet and sour sauces and chilli chutney, topped with yoghurt and sev and garnished with blended spices
$10.99
SAMOSA CHAAT
A fried potato filled pastry dunked in chick peas sauce, topped with onions, sweet and sour sauces, chilli chutney, yoghurt and sev, and garnished with blended spices
$10.99

Great Food​!
If you want to grab a quick bite during your lunch break, or take-out a dinner meal for the whole family.
​
Our ingredient's and food QUALITY is always fresh.
Our food serving QUANTITY is always generous.
Our food PRICES are always reasonable.
​
Best of all, the only meat(s) we use are 100% Halal (Zabiha) certified.
Prime Location!
We are located in Duluth, Georgia! Just off the Breckinridge Blvd & Old Norcross Rd intersection in the Breckinridge Corners Shopping Plaza.
​
​
Easy Access from:
﻿
I-85 N: (Exit 104) Pleasant Hill Rd just under 1.25 mi off the exit ramp.
​
I-85 S: (Exit 10) Boggs Rd just under 1.3 mi off the exit ramp.
﻿​
GA-316 W: Pleasant Hill Rd Exit just under 1.25 mi off the exit ramp.
​
We Cater!
We cater for any and every type of event.
​
Whether you need us to cater for an event at a ​
​
banquet facility
​
or a small gathering in your home.
​
We can help you build your menu within your budget.
​
We also cater via itemized trays.

Our Services
Catering Services
At Veduka South Indian Restaurant, our catering services bring the rich flavors of South India to your event. We offer customized menus designed to delight your guests and make every occasion memorable with authentic, expertly crafted dishes.
Corporate Lunch Boxes
Vedukaâs corporate lunch boxes are the perfect solution for office meals. Our South Indian lunch boxes combine taste and convenience, providing your team with a flavorful and satisfying break during the workday, while maintaining high standards of freshness and quality.
Live Counters
Enhance your event with Vedukaâs live counters, where our skilled chefs prepare South Indian specialties right before your guests. This interactive dining experience brings vibrant flavors and a touch of excitement, ensuring your event is both memorable and delicious.

                    Indian Cuisine - Taste the Celebration, ensuring you can

OUR BUFFET PRICES
Choose from a huge selection of foods in an all-you-can-eat buffet style. From Chinese to Korean to Sushi and Southern Cuisine, we're sure you'll find something you like. We even have Hibachi and Noodle stations where you can make your own bowl! Don't forget to leave room for the dessert station filled with cakes, cookies, ice cream, and other sweet treats!

Paper Rip
Prime Pizza
Welcome to Prime Pizza - one of the best places for a delicious slice in Atlanta, GA!

Located on Riverdale Rd, we offer outstanding food and service to all local foodies. Each item on our diverse menu is made with the freshest ingredients available. Join us for lunch or dinner or order takeout or delivery. Either way, you're in for a real treat.

That said, let's dive into our pizza selection. Enjoy our classic Cheese pie or even customize it further by picking the toppings you prefer. Likewise, we suggest our White pie with provolone, mozzarella, cheddar cheese, and garlic sauce.

In addition, we serve a number of specialty combinations. Indulge in our Supreme pizza with pepperoni, sausage, ground beef, ham, onions, mushrooms, green peppers, and black olives.

For vegetarians, our Veggie pie is the perfect choice. It comes with mushrooms, onions, hot peppers, tomatoes, green peppers, and green & black olives.

Another great pick is our traditional Margherita. This timeless pizza is topped with tomatoes, basil, oregano, extra virgin olive oil, and mozzarella cheese.

Take your taste buds on an adventure with one of our exotic pizza options. We recommend our Hawaiian pie with ham, Canadian bacon, pineapple, and extra cheese.

Start your meal with any of our irresistible side orders and wings. We have everything from onion rings and mozzarella sticks to pizza fries and boneless wings.

For something fresh, choose one of our delicious salads. Our Greek, Caesar, and Chef's salad are all a great option.

As the right substitute for pizza, grab our chicken, steak, or regular cheese calzone. Our veggie stromboli is amazing, too.

Furthermore, we offer a variety of subs such as our meatballs, Philly cheesesteak, chicken Philly, hot Italian sub, and others.

On top of that, our menu features dishes from a few different cuisines. Hence, we serve great-tasting Indian and Jamaican food, as well as shawarmas and gyros. 
We also provide a fantastic selection of pasta dishes including our spaghetti, ravioli, and lasagna.

For seafood lovers, we offer items such as our crab cakes, jumbo shrimp, and a shrimp basket.

Finally, you can finish your meal on a sweet note with one of our outstanding desserts. Enjoy our cheesecake, Red Velvet cake (a must-try!), classic apple pie, or perhaps some refreshing ice cream.

Stop by for lunch or dinner at your earliest convenience. Our friendly staff is eager to serve you. Of course, you can also order online for pickup or delivery and enjoy our delicious food comfortably at home. See you soon!
5290 Riverdale Rd
Atlanta, GA 30349

Best Indian Food | Curry Up Now Menu
California is home to the largest population of Indians outside of India and our style of cooking is ~9,000 miles and ~125 years in the making. Traditional rituals with flavor-forward flair. Firmly familiar to some and fantastically fun for all. Indian at heart while Californian in spirit. This is your Auntie’s tikka wrapped in your Tía’s burrito...Bombay tandoori riding with Bay Area burgers...New Delhi naan if pizza-fied by SoCal surfers. You’ve had thalis and kathis and biryanis in the past. But this is Curry Up Now: the hyphenated hero of the Indo-Californian kitchen, remixing street food from the Land of Spices with culinary classics from the Land of Dreams.
lil' & not so lil' nibbles. perfect shareables

FAQ’s
Where can I find Indian food near me?
Curry Up Now serves modern Indian street food at multiple locations across the U.S. Just search “Indian food near me” and visit our locations page.
Who serves the best Indian food near me?
Curry Up Now is known for its creative and flavorful Californian-Indian dishes. From Tikka Masala Burritos to Deconstructed Samosas, we’ve redefined Indian street food. Search “best Indian food near me” and experience the twist!
Is there Indian food near me open now?
Yes, most Curry Up Now locations are open for lunch and dinner daily. Search “Indian food near me open now” and check our hours online. We also offer delivery and takeout through food apps.
Where can I try authentic Indian street food near me?
Curry Up Now brings the taste of Indian street food with global flair to your neighborhood. Try fan favorites like Pav Bhaji, Vada Pav, and Kathi Rolls. Search “Indian street food near me” to find your nearest location.

the Golden Buddha restaurant

serve

Hungry?!
Good, we are here
to
serve
you
$15 minimum order for delivery. 10 to 15 minutes for carryout. 45 minutes to 1 hour for delivery. You must be 18 or older to make an order.
Empress Chicken
Chicke with String Bean
Singore Curry Chicken Mi Fun
Clear Noodle Soup with Seafood and Shredded Pork
Welcome
Among metro Atlanta's 100-plus Chinese restaurants are two that would belong in any listing of the top 20: The Golden Buddha and China Gate.
We quit eating at the decade-old Golden Buddha, with it's big buddha guarding the door, three years ago because the food and service had gone from being some of the best in Atlanta to ranking among the worst. We recently went back and found great improvements.
The service, provided by smiling young waiters, is cheery and friendly now. But the major change has been in the quality and visual appeal of the food. Dishes that were previously marred by the flabby, over-cooked vegetables and chewy, flavorless meats are subtly seasoned works of art today. The crisp vegetables are a palate of colors on the plate. The meats and seafood are fresh.
While the Golden Buddha is best known for it's mandarin style of cooking, spicier Szechuan dishes are also available. One of the best of the restaurant's incendiary dishes is Sa-Cha shrimp, a lip-puckering blend of shrimp, mixed vegetables and red pepper. The hot braised fish, a whole red snapper topped with onion, ground pork and hot peppers, is another sure-to-please dish, but on that will make you grab for your water glass after the first bite or two.
For milder, and a good complement to the Szechuan dishes, are Chow Fen Sz, strands of bean thread noodles, mixed with pork and vegetables, or the soft Lo Mein noodles served with pork or chicken.
The restaurant's two large dining rooms, lined with booths and tables are inviting and comfortable and generally crowded with a mix of Chinese an American families and Emory students and employees from the nearby Centers of Disease Control.
Copyright 2025 © The Golden Buddha Restaurant. All rights reserved.

Where We Started
Our Story
Oriental Cuisine Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese & Japanese cuisine in Roswell, GA. Oriental Cuisine's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for dine-in or take-out meals in the Roswell community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

What our customers say
Reviews
It was delicious! Definitely the best Japanese and Chinese food in Roswell! Super clean and formal place. We will definitely be back!
Nare Funckner
The food and service is amazing. Love the atmosphere. They are all so friendly. The waiter, Jafari was quick with the food and very polite.
Jasmine Chen
New Chinese Food place in Roswell. I did a takeout and the food was ready in 10 minutes. The food was great tasting and the perfect size.
Karen Korshak
This is amazing food! And a great ambiance as well. Highly recommended. So glad to have this place right in our local neighborhood.
Dave Ake
We have been there four times in the last two weeks, with different people, and had four different menu items. Each was fantastic.
John Thomson
The food was very good and fresh. The service was also very good. Drinks were always full and the server was very polite and personable.
Al Mack

Once cooked, our staff will filet your fish for your enjoyment. All fish are served with Chef Pano's Cretan extra virgin olive oil, lemon, Santorini capers and Tuscan Kale

CURBSIDE, TAKEOUT, DELIVERY is available from Tuesday to Sunday, 11:30 AM to 9:00 PM
About Us
Kyma is a contemporary seafood tavern with an inventive yet approachable menu that stays true to its Greek origins. Kyma’s dazzling constellation display on the deep blue ceiling, white marble columns and bold fresh fish display are dramatic while the inviting patio offers an ideal setting for savoring a glass of Greek wine. Fresh, healthy food, attentive Greek hospitality and festive atmosphere await at Kyma.

Consuming seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions. To our guests with food sensitivities, allergies or special dietary needs, our restaurants prepare and serve products that contain peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish, eggs, milk, soy and gluten. Regular kitchen operations involve shared cooking and preparation areas, and food variations may occur due to differences in suppliers, ingredient substitutions, recipe revisions, and/or preparation at the restaurant. For these reasons, we cannot guarantee that any menu item will be completely free of allergens.

You   Can   Eat

Book Your Table Now
About Us
At
Top Korean BBQ and Hot Pot
, our specialities are Korean BBQ & Hot Pot. With eight in-house hotpot broths, ranging from mild to spicy, and marinated proteins in Hometown Special Sauce, the assortment in textures and flavors will transport your taste buds to the next level. 

The All-You-Can-Eat extensive selections feature fresh seafood, quality meat, wholesome vegetables and finest ingredients from the neighborhood market and USDA Food vendor. To turn your hotpot and BBQ game up a notch, we have customize-your-own sauce stations that consist of over 20 kinds of carefully selected sauces, ranging from traditional satay sauce to contemporary western peanut butter. 

At Top Korean BBQ & Hot Pot, we believe that customer service is absolute. Whether it is barbecuing cuts to perfection or singing birthday song, we vow to go the extra mile in making your dining experience a special one. Come dine with us, and we promise a memorable blanch and sizzle adventure like none youâve ever had before.

Top Korean BBQ and Hot Pot specializes on hotpot and BBQ. With eight in-house hotpot broths, ranging from mild to spicy, and marinated proteins in Hometown Special Sauce, the assortment in textures and flavors will transport your taste buds to the next level. 

The All-You-Can-Eat extensive selections feature fresh seafood, quality meat, wholesome vegetables and finest ingredients from the neighborhood market and USDA Food vendor. To turn your hotpot and BBQ game up a notch, we have customize-your-own sauce stations that consist of over 20 kinds of carefully selected sauces, ranging from traditional satay sauce to contemporary western peanut butter. 

At Top Korean BBQ & Hot Pot, we believe that customer service is absolute. Whether it is barbecuing cuts to perfection or singing birthday song, we vow to go the extra mile in making your dining experience a special one. Orders must be placed 30 minutes prior to closing.
We can prepare most of our dishes in a vegetarian style and offer gluten-free options upon request.
Please be aware that consuming raw or undercooked seafood, shellfish, poultry, eggs, or meats may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially for individuals with certain medical conditions. Our food may contain or come into contact with common allergens, including dairy, eggs, wheat, soybeans, tree nuts, peanuts, fish, shellfish, and mushrooms. Please inform us of any food allergies or special dietary requirements before ordering. We will do our best to accommodate your dietary preferences to the greatest extent possible.
