Menu
Taste of Indonesia: Family Feast for 4 — Now $55!
Taste of Indonesia: Family Feast for 4! ~ Now Just $55!
Why cook tonight? Gather the family for an authentic Indonesian feast delivered right to your door in Roswell!
Our “Indonesian Family Special” is the perfect hassle-free dinner for four and includes all of these authentic favorites:
4 pieces of Lemper Ayam (Savory Chicken Sticky Rice)
Beef Rendang (Rich and tender slow-cooked beef)
Chicken Kwetiaw (Stir-fried flat noodles)
Chicken Nasi Goreng with Fried Egg (Classic Indonesian Fried Rice)
🌶️ Customize Your Spice! Make it mild for the kids or extra spicy for the adventurous. You can set the spice level for each dish. Just write in the special instruction section!
For a limited time, get this entire feast for just $55 and enjoy FREE DELIVERY on us!
This exclusive deal is available for online orders only.
Starters

FRIED RICE & NOODLE
ENTREE
VEGAN
GLUTEN FREE

Facebook

About This Site
Rasa Sayang Asian Kitchen’s website reflects its warm, multicultural spirit. The homepage highlights their specialties—
Malaysian, Chinese, Thai, and Indonesian cuisine
—and invites visitors to order online, make reservations, or explore the menu. Their “About” section shares that they’ve proudly served the Roswell, GA community for over a decade, offering authentic Southeast Asian dishes in a cozy, welcoming setting.
Find Us
Address
1425 Market Blvd Suite 1390. Roswell GA 30076

Our kitchen is closed 30 minutes prior to business hours to allow our staff to focus on cleaning and closing duties. Thank you for your understanding.

Q:
How would you order of you don't eat everything in the variety bowl that it comes with? Would you just choose soup, meat, and then order individual sides? Seems like that would quickly add up.
A:
If it's one or two things they'll let you sub something else that already comes on the platter. Example, I don't like tomato or egg. So I say no tomato or egg but could I please have extra enoki and oysters mushrooms and they do.
Dominic E.
1 person found this helpful

Q:

A:
Yes, they offer just potatoes/radish/vegetable entrees.
Feng W.

Dim Sum
Four homemade delicate chicken & shrimp dumplings, served with chili-garlic Thai sweet soy sauce.
Egg Rolls
Three homemade delicately fried vegetarian rolls with Surin’s sweet and sour sauce.
Crab Angels
Four fried crab and seasoned cream cheese in wonton wraps with Surin’s sweet and sour sauce.
Pot Stickers with Red Curry
Delicate vegetable and pork ﬁlled dumplings served in a Thai red curry sauce.
Fresh Basil Rolls
Two rolls ﬁlled with leaf lettuce, fresh basil, bean sprouts, rice noodles, and ﬂavorful Thai pork patty meat & fresh shrimp, accompanied with Surin’s lightly spiced plum-peanut sauce.
Crispy Squid
Young and tender calamari lightly battered and served with a homemade sweet and sour sauce.
Chicken Larb
Ground chicken spiced with basil, onions, lime juice, rice powder, lettuce, and chilies. Served with crisp cabbage.
Baskets
A unique (ﬂavor) combination of shrimp, corn, chicken, onion, cilantro and Surin’s spices; served in six miniature pastry baskets. Accompanied with a honey-peanut cucumber sauce.
Satay Chicken
Sliced lean ﬁlets marinated in Thai spices, skewered & char-grilled, served with peanut sauce & cucumber salad.
Moo Yang
Char-grilled marinated lean pork loin ﬁlets, served with a spicy onion-cilantro dipping sauce & crisp mixed greens.
Soup & Salads
ORDER ONLINE
Spicy Hot and Sour Shrimp Soup
Lightly garnished with cilantro, mushrooms, and scallions.
Spicy Seafood Soup
Fresh squid, mussels, shrimp, scallions, scallops and fresh ginger in a spicy broth.
Spicy Coconut Soup
Lightly garnished with cilantro, mushrooms, and scallions. Shrimp 6.50 Chicken or Tofu.
Yum Yai Salad
Crisp romaine, tomatoes, onions, boiled egg, cucumber, shrimp, & chicken with a sweet and sour peanut dressing.
Wonton Soup
Shrimp and chicken stu
ﬀed wontons in a ﬂavorful soup broth with napa cabbage and garnished with scallions & cilantro. 5.00
Fresh Thai Salad
Sliced egg, cucumber, tomatoes, and bean sprouts on a bed of crisp romaine lettuce with a Surin’s creamy peanut dressing.
Spicy Beef Salad
Grilled marinated lean beef, tomatoes, onion, cucumber in spicy Surin’s sauce with romaine lettuce.
Fresh Thai Stir Fried
ORDER ONLINE
Veggie Delight
A medley of broccoli, carrots, onion, baby corn, green beans, napa, bean sprouts, & zucchini in a light Thai sauce.
Spicy Basil Leaves
Fresh basil, bell peppers, bamboo shoots and Surin’s hot chili sauce: suggested with lean minced chicken.
Pad Prik
Thai spicy dish combines red and green bell peppers, onions, garlic, and straw mushrooms in a pepper sauce.
Cashew Nut
Green bell peppers, garlic, green and white onions stir fried with cashew nuts in a spicy pepper sauce.
Garlic Lovers Broccoli
Spicy garlic sauce with black & white pepper; topped with cilantro & scallions served on a nest of steamed broccoli.
Thai Curries
Chicken Panang
Red curry paste sautéed with coconut milk, bell peppers, chicken breast and basil leaves.
Masaman Chicken
Boneless chicken breast sautéed in a Thai masaman curry with avocadoes and cashew nuts.
Beef Masaman
Chunks of beef are simmered in a special masaman curry with potatoes, onions, carrots, and peanuts.
Chicken Curry
A mild yellow Thai curry typical of central Thailand prepared with potatoes, onions, and carrots.
Shrimp Curry
Hot green Thai curry sauce made with red & green bell peppers, green beans, basil leaves, napa cabbage, & zucchini.
Noodles and Rice
ORDER ONLINE
Fried Rice
Fresh steamed white rice stir-fried with egg, tomatoes, white onions, and scallions & cilantro.
Pad Woon Sen
Sautéed silver (mung bean) noodles, egg, bean sprouts, onions, tomato, carrots, napa, & cabbage.
Spicy Beef Noodle
Flat rice noodles stir fried with beef, egg, broccoli, basil, green beans, tomato, and onion.
Pad See U
Thai ﬂat rice noodles sautéed with egg, broccoli, garlic, and Thai soy sauce.
Thai Noodle
Thai thin rice noodles, pan fried with shrimp,  chicken, scallions, sprouts & egg;  garnished with peanuts and beans prouts.
Spicy Spaghetti
Green beans, onion, basil leaves, tomato, shrimp, and chicken in a Thai based chili sauce with wheat pasta.
Special Entrees
ORDER ONLINE
Sweet & Sour Chicken
Battered and deep fried with sweet & sour sauce with onions, bell peppers, tomato, and pineapple.
Spicy Mixed Seafood
Paciﬁc mussels, sea scallops, plump shrimp, caVish and squid prepared in Surin’s stir fry with a spicy basil sauce, onions, and bell peppers.
Ka Proud Lamb
Char-grilled lamb chops seasoned with Ka Proud Basil sauce. Served with Surin’s spicy basil. fresh mushroom, onion, and chopped bell pepper sauce and with shrimp fried rice.
Roasted Duck with Red Curry
Roasted duck; de-boned then marinated overnight in a red curry sauce, blended with kiﬃr leaf, basil, pineapple, red bell peppers and fresh tomato.
Nom Tok Beef
Tender ﬁllets of beef tenderloin in a spicy mixture of lime, chili pepper, basil leaves, rice powder, and crisp red onion. Served with Thai sticky rice and with crisp cabbage leaves to roll the beef into and devour.
Moo Nom Tok
Char-grilled lean pork loin ﬁlets in a spicy mixture of lime, chili pepper, basil leaves, rice powder, and crisp red onion. with crisp cabbage leaves to roll the pork into for a crispy hand held fusion. Served with Thai sticky rice.
Shrimp in Roasted Pineapple
Large shrimp, chunks of fresh roasted pineapple, and a Thai pineapple sauce, with red and green bell peppers topped with cashew nuts. Served in a pineapple boat.
Spicy Garlic Scallops
Fresh scallops pan fried in a spicy black pepper garlic sauce, with, asparagus, and carrots. Served with steamed baby corn and broccoli.
Thai Barbecued Chicken
Half a chicken marinated overnight in Surin’s BBQ sauce and slow roasted and chargrilled to perfection then served with shrimp fried rice.
Wing of Angel
Two jumbo chicken wings, de-boned then over stuﬀed with shrimp, chicken, and spices. Served with onions, green bell peppers, pineapple, and tomatoes with shrimp fried rice.

Real Vanilla Bean Ice Cream

Peanut Butter Pie

ORDER ONLINE

Yum Yai Salad
Crisp romaine lettuce, tomatoes, red & green onions, boiled egg, cucumber, carrot, shrimp & chicken with a sweet and sour peanut dressing.
Spicy Beef
Grilled marinated strips of lean beef, tomato, onion, & cucumber in spicy Surin sauce with romaine lettuce.
Chicken Warm Salad

Chicken Noodle Bowl

Chicken Masaman with Avocado

Spicy Eggplant Noodle

Pad Prik Pork
This spicy hot dish combines red and green bell peppers, onions, garlic, and straw mushrooms in a pepper sauce; with lean pork tenderloin.
Succulent Catfish

Thai BBQ Chicken
Half chicken marinated overnight in Surin’s BBQ sauce and slow roasted to perfection then grilled Thai style; served with shrimp fried rice.
Roasted Duck with Red Curry
Roasted duck; de-boned then marinated overnight in a red curry sauce, blended with leaf, basil, bell peppers, pineapple, and fresh tomato.
Thai Noodle
Thai thin rice noodles, pan fried with shrimp & chicken, scallions, sprouts, and egg; garnished with peanuts and bean sprouts.
Beef Noodle Bowl
A rich beef broth with thick sliced ﬂank steak, rice noodles, crisp romaine lettuce, bean sprouts, green onions, celery, and garlic.
Khoa Man Gai
Marinated boneless chicken breast with a crispy tempura, and aromatic Thai style rice cooked in chicken broth and a spicy ginger garlic dipping sauce. Accompanied with dressed fresh greens.

raw_text:
Rain Thai and Susi Bar
Home
Menu
Order Online
About
Pages
Staff
Gallery

blog
Contact
Rain  Menu
At Rain we pride ourselves with freshly prepared food and our ingredients are made in-house as well as the ingredient for our many specialties drinks, therefore the taste of freshness will always remains.
We hope that you share your experience with others.
Phone
+01 (404) 325-6963
Email
rainthaisushi@hotmail.com
Location
2345 Cheshire Bridge Rd, Atlanta, GA
About Us
Rain founded by a couple of restauranture.
						These individuals had many years of restaurants experience from Thailand.  Ranging from 5 stars hotel chefs to an individual who was raised on a farm that had mastered many natural ingredients while at a young age.
Rain restaurant is currently managed by Noy Mey, Who graduated from Johnson & Wales University Culinary Arts School.
						After graduation Noy went onto having her own
Thai restaurant
in Providence Rhode Island Called Thai Star Restaurant.
						The restaurant was featured in Providence Journal as well as The Rhode Island Monthly Magazine.  
						After moving to Georgia Noy & Sokkim bought into partnership at Rain.

Available with Chicken, Beef, or a Seafood Medley.
v

Egg Noodle Soup
(MEAL) Another version of our Pho soup, using yellow egg-based noodles rather than traditional white rice-based vermicelli. The broth used is a beef broth with a dash of fried garlic and green onions. Also contains bean sprouts, basil leaves, lime, and jalapenos in addition to the egg noodle base. which will come on the side for dine-in orders. Available with Chicken, Beef, or a Seafood Medley.

Our Menu
We bring out the flavor of the world. We want to open up your mind, and show you that vegan has no boundary. From Asia, to Europe, to North and South America, or to Australia, “Any type of dish can now be replaced by vegan”, and it will taste as good as the original dish if not better.

Reviews
review by - Yelp
Keith H:
Having lived in Woodstock for several years now and searched the area the one thing missing was the lack of a good Chinese or Asian restaurant of any kind. It may be more expensive than the others as some have said but it is much much better than any others in the area...
review by - Yelp
Samantha M:
My daughter and I tried this restaurant tonight and ordered a variety of dishes to sample. She is vegetarian and there were so many items for her to choose from. The masaman roti was very good - the roti were flaky and the sauce was very tasty...
review by - Yelp
Larry B:
Excellent food, service, and many gluten free options too!!! A very comfortable, casual dining atmosphere that is really enjoyable. Also, since were have food allergies, the staff are very helpful with our selections and ensuring the kitchen is made aware of the situation.
review by - Yelp
Katy S:
Hidden gem! This place is amazing! I've been to more Thai restaurants than I can count, and all over... scouts honor. But this restaurant pays very particular attention to detail. Very impressed... And they're open until 10 pm most days...
review by - Yelp
Leigh Ann L:
Just tried this new Thai restaurant in Woodstock, and I'm happy to say "We will be back!"  Great Pad Thai and  Masaman Curry. Love the smooth jazz playing in the background.  Nice atmosphere too.  Very enjoyable in every way!!

address: 237 Perimeter Center Pkwy NE, Ste H31, Dunwoody, GA 30346
raw_text:
Food – Yaoatlanta
Skip to content
Yaoatlanta
Reservation
Menu
Gallery
How it made
Private Events
Gift Cards
Order
Contact
Instagram
Facebook
Youtube
Food
Appetizer
1.Taro Rolls /9
Crispy spring rolls stuffed with succulent prawns and sweet taro, served with sweet chili sauce.
2. Truffle Parmesan Chips /8
These Parmesan truffles chips will satisfy all of your potato chip cravings. They’re so incredibly good.
3.  Summer Roll /8 (Tofu or shrimp) 6/8
Shrimp, Kani Kama, salad mix, lettuce, carrots, bean sprouts, cilantro, noodles, Thai basil with hoisin dipping sauce. (tofu option available)
4.  Chicken Satay /8
A perfect chicken satay skewers grilled over fire and then served with a savory peanut dipping sauce, fresh cucumber relish.
5.  Dumplings /9
Ground meat (chicken, shrimp & pork), Napa cabbage, green onions, cilantro, charred shishito peppers, creamy sambal sauce.
6.  Chashu Pork Bao Bun /8
Delicious braised pork belly teriyaki, fresh cucumber relish, cilantro, pickled veggies stuffed into a warm fluffy bao bun.
7.  Potsticker/8
Ground meat (chicken, shrimp & pork)and veggies, pan-fried with Thai Penang curry sauce.
8.  Edamame /6 (sea salt or wok charred) 5/6
Sea salt or Spicy wok charred garlic Sichuan.
9.  Crab wontons /9
This crisp, fried wonton is loaded with Philadelphia cream cheese, kani kama, green onions served with sweet chili sauce.
Dessert
1.Yao’s ice cream/10
A signature butterfly pea coconut ice cream on top young coconut, roasted peanut, salted egg yolk in coconut shell.
2.Belle Helene/12
Poached pear in red wine, butterfly pea coconut ice cream, cinnamon stick and roasted peanut.
Yao entrees
1.Khoa Soi Gai /24
This mouthwatering blend of soft and crispy noodles in a tasty curry broth combined with a tender chicken, lime, pickled green mustard, red onions, quail egg.
2. Spaghetti with Northern Thai sausage /22
Spicy Northern Thai sausage, dried chili, lemongrass, Thai basil, Parmesan cheese topped with crispy basil.
3. Roasted Duck Noodles /26
Fresh egg noodles and is topped with delicious roasted duck, Yu choy cilantro and quail egg.
4. Traditional Jumbo prawn Pad Thai /26
Known as one of the most popular Thai noodle dishes, our version features stir-fried fresh thin rice noodles mixed with a tangy tamarind sauce combined with egg, crispy tofu, sweet radishes, bean sprouts, onion chives, crushed peanuts.
5. Crab Fried Rice /26
A generous portion of succulent crab meat stir-fried with jasmine rice, egg, green onions, cilantro topped with jumbo lump crab meat omelette.
6. Duck Fried Rice /24
Jasmine rice stir-fried with roasted duck, raisins, egg, carrots, green onions and cilantro.
7. Crispy Garlic Chicken /19
Bite- sized pieces of boneless chicken, season to perfection, lightly breaded, coated in a sweet and garlicky infused sauce topped with crispy garlic, basil leaves and red bell peppers
8. Catch Of the Day /MP
Crispy whole fish in salt and pepper, fresh green onions, cilantro, roasted garlic and minced chili.
9. Salmon Panang/25
Perfectly grilled salmon filet atop jasmine rice, fresh cucumber, in panang sauce topped with tobiko and coconut milk foam
10. Ishiyaki wagyu /MP
Cooked table side on a hot river stone, Thai style chimichurri dipping sauce.
11. Khao Mun Gai /22
Thai chicken and ginger rice served with our signature ginger sauce and sweet black dipping sauce, fresh cucumber, cilantro, it’s simply delicious.
Grill menu
1.King Oyster mushroom steak /5
Homemade Coca Cola teriyaki glaze.
2. Cha Siu Pork Belly /10
Sriracha Barbecue glaze.
3. Shishito Pepper /5
Charred with spicy garlic Sichuan.
4. Romaine Lettuce /7
With Caesar- like dressing, Parmesan cheese.
5. Negimaki /15
Thinking of it as “meat sushi”, homemade Coca Cola teriyaki sauce.
6. Fish Tofu /6
Served with sweet chili glaze.
7. Calamari /12
Turmeric, sweet soy sauce served with Thai style chimichurri sauce.
8. Corn on the cob /5
With sweet coconut milk butter.
9. Asian chicken BBQ /8
Red onions, bell peppers, tomato, fresh pineapple with sriracha barbecue glaze.
10. Spicy teriyaki tofu /17
Crispy tofu skewers, homemade Coca Cola teriyaki sauce topped with fried shallots, green onions and cilantro.
Soup and Salad
1.Chicken Tom Yum Soup /8
Our famous spicy and sour soup. The flavors of lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, fresh lime juice, tomato, mushroom and cilantro.
2.  Wonton soup /8
Homemade Rose-shaped Wonton filled with seasoned meat (chicken, shrimp, pork) yu choy, crispy garlic, cilantro in a clear broth.
3. Yao’s duck salad /26
Our signature Crispy duck salad, pomegranate seeds, roasted pine nuts, celery, micro rainbow mix tossed in hoisin vinaigrette
4. House salad /9
Chopped lettuce, salad mix, cucumber, carrots, red onions, tomato, apple, grapes, quail egg served with honey lemon vinaigrette.
Veggie Dishes
1.Yu Choy /11
Most flavorful, classic preparation of greens imaginable, and it pairs beautifully with almost Asian dishes served with homemade brown sauce and sesame seed.
2.  Eggplant Cold Salad/12
Garlic, Thai chili, green chili, cilantro, sesame oil vinaigrette.
3.  Mix Mushrooms /14
Shimeji mushrooms (white and brown), king oyster mushroom sauté with homemade brown sauce.
4.  Sichuan Green beans /11
Flash-fried green beans in a spicy garlicky Sichuan sauce.
5.  Tofu skin and wood ear mushrooms /12
Fresh cucumber, bell pepper, tofu skin, wood ear mushrooms in light sesame brown sauce.

Welcome to Ruth’s Chris in Downtown Atlanta, Georgia, where our dedicated team is committed to crafting for you an extraordinary dining experience unlike anything else. Our steak house is conveniently located in the lobby of the Embassy Suites Hotel at Centennial Olympic Park, and near numerous attractions like World of Coke, Georgia Aquarium, Georgia World Congress Center, CNN World Headquarters, Georgia State University & Rialto Center, Philips Arena, The TOUR Championship, Centennial Park District, Fox Theater. Whether you’re celebrating a special milestone, entertaining clients, or simply enjoying a night out with friends and family, count on us to deliver to you the finest steaks, the best service, and a level of hospitality that has made Ruth’s Chris one of the most revered names in steak since Ruth Fertel opened our first restaurant in 1965.
Polite Notice
At Ruth’s Chris we promote a comfortable, family-friendly, and welcoming atmosphere for everyone. We ask Guests to support this atmosphere by not wearing workout gear, pool attire, cut-off shorts, tank tops, clothing with offensive graphics or language, revealing clothing or exposed undergarments. We kindly ask all Guests to remove hats when entering. Hats and team support jerseys are welcome in our bar and lounge areas. Specific requirements may vary by location.
Explore our menus
At Ruth’s Chris, your last bite is just as good as your first. Simply select one of the menus below to explore our many mouth-watering options.

Treat yourself to a traditional steakhouse experience that sizzles with savings, when you choose our new Ruth’s Classics menu. Featuring perfect portions of some of our most popular dishes, we invite you to select a starter, entree and personal side from the menu below to create your very own Ruth’s Chris meal, starting at $68.

DINE-IN DINNER HOURS

5 — 10 p.m.
Reservations via Resy
Walk-In Seating at the Bar

Click Below to Purchase a LITTLE BEAR Gift Card
GIFT CARDS
CURRENT MENU
Follow @LITTLEBEARATL for menu updates, new beverages, and pictures of Fernando
INSTAGRAM
71-A Georgia Avenue SE, Ste. A
Atlanta, GA 30312
(404) 500-5396
info, private events, jobs, general inquires, etc: littlebear@littlebearatl.com
reservations available via resy by clicking the ‘book now’ button above
little bear merch can be ordered online by clicking the ‘visit my shop’ button above
e-gift cards for purchase by clicking the ‘gift cards’ button above
DIRECTIONS
PHONE ISSUES
Having trouble getting through? Do not fret! If both lines are occupied, our phone makes weird sounds. Just try again a minute or two later!
DIETARY RESTRICTIONS
Vegetarian/Vegan, Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Nut Free and most other standard allergies or dietary restrictions can be accommodated nightly through our a la carte menu but not our prix fixe menu. For more complicated allergies, we can usually accommodate with at least a few days advance warning. Regardless, please make a note when booking on Resy so we can make you the best, safest food possible for you without sacrificing flavor! Xoxo
An open ended digital cookbook written month to month in real time with dish & cocktail recipes from our current menu! A traditional cookbook is still in the plans eventually but those feel so permanent and stuck in time, which goes against the very nature of Little Bear and how we source. Our restaurant is hyper seasonal and focused on the fleeting, ephemeral and ever changing nature of genuine seasonal cooking so why would we not find a way to make a cookbook that reflects our style?
SUBSCRIBE!

name: Highland Tap
address: 1026 N Highland Ave NE, Atlanta, GA 30306
raw_text:
welcome
We proudly prepare and serve as many
products as possible
While 
				Highland Tap is best known for its slow roasted prime rib and wood 
				grilled steaks,
we take pride in everything we prepare including 
				fresh seafood, chicken, and vegetarian items.
We strive to exceed 
				your every expectation.
There may be a risk associated with consuming raw protein products. If you suffer from chronic illness of the liver, stomach,
or blood, or have other immune disorders, you should not consume these products. Not responsible for lost or stolen property. 20% gratuity will be added to parties of six or more.

Toggle Navigation
CAFÉ
BRUNCH
LUNCH
DINNER
Our menus are inspirationally driven according to what is being grown in our onsite garden, and by our farm partners. When something is no longer available, or not at its peak, the menu changes. Our Chefs do this so you can experience the very best of what is in season each time you visit. Our philosophy is built on fundamentally sound cooking. We love classic dishes, elevated by fresh seasonal ingredients and technique. Respect for each ingredient within a dish lets it shine in its own space as well as a whole.
“Great food does not start in the kitchen; it starts with the soil, and the seeds that are sown.”
Our menus are inspirationally driven according to what is being grown in our onsite garden, and by our farm partners. When something is no longer available, or not at its peak, the menu changes. Our Chefs do this so you can experience the very best of what is in season each time you visit. Our philosophy is built on fundamentally sound cooking techniques. We love classic, comforting dishes, elevated by fresh ingredients and sound technique. Respect for each ingredient within a dish lets it shine in its own space as well as as a whole.

Your night out deserves to feel like an escape — a world apart where the pace slows, the noise softens, and you’re wrapped in a sense of ease.
Verdure is the place that welcomes you in with the warmth of an African sunset, where conversations flow like water from an oasis and evenings are made just as magical.
Step out of Atlanta`s whirlwind without traveling far — we beat to the drum of Atlanta`s heart, nestled beside Piedmont Park.
See you for dinner.

Two years in bloom. 🌿
Two years of evenings steeped in flavor and story.
This September, Verdure marks its 2nd Anniversary with a three-night culinary journey—
honoring the cuisines of Kenya, Côte d’Ivoire, and South Africa through the artistry of Chef Jean-Louis Sangare.
🥂 Coastal spice.
🍴 Smoky braise.
🍰 Nostalgic sweetness.
An African fine-dining celebration by Piedmont Park—intimate, transportive, unforgettable.
✨ Reserve your table through the link in our bio.
Tap “Remind Me” above to be notified as the celebration begins.
#VerdureKitchenandCocktails #VerdureAnniversary #AtlantaEvents #CulinaryEvents

verdureatlanta
View Instagram post by verdureatlanta
Aug 26
Open post by verdureatlanta with ID 18074045321477200
Two years of Verdure.
Two years of evenings that feel like a world apart.
This September, we mark the occasion with a three-day culinary journey celebrating the flavors of Kenya, Côte d’Ivoire, and South Africa through the lens of Chef Jean-Louis Sangare.
🥂 Starters – Kenya
Swahili coconut prawn curry bisque, kachumbari salad, and fire-kissed nyama choma carpaccio.
🍴 Mains – Ivory Coast
Braised beef short ribs, branzino with tomato concassé, and the Abidjan pepper-crusted ribeye.
🍰 Desserts – South Africa
Amarula malva cake, milk tart cheesecake, and the irresistible sticky tipsy tart.
Each course is a story — coastal spice, smoky braise, nostalgic sweetness — woven together to honor where we’ve been and where we’re going.
Join us September 5 – 7 for an anniversary weekend that feels intimate, transportive, and unforgettable.
✨ Reserve your evening.
Midtown, steps from Piedmont Park.
#atlantadining #africancuisine #atlevents #atlantaevents #culinaryevents

✨ Your evening deserves magic.
Crisp-edged octopus, silken corn purée, a whisper of verdure oil, and that crisp flavor of pickled onion, this dish is everything Wednesday was missing.
Meet Chef Jean-Louis Sangare`s Crispy Fried Octopus.
The kind of plate that invites silence, then a reach across the table.
The kind of night that calls for another round and on Wednesdays, the second martini or glass of wine is our gift to you.
Seeing us on Thursday? Our handcrafted margaritas take center stage, a weekly ritual for those who appreciate a little citrus and spice.
Walk in or reserve. We’re pouring, plating, and redefining what a weeknight can be.
#VerdureKitchen #AtlantaDining #CulturedEvenings #OctopusDish #WeeknightRitual #ElevatedSips

About the Business
Business owner information
Federico C.
Business Owner
We are a modern Spanish restaurant combining the tastes of Spain, with a fresh, eclectic, American social atmosphere. The focus of our menu is on traditional cured meats and Spanish cheese and tapas. While we spend a great deal of time honoring traditional Spanish flavor combinations we are also inspired by modern techniques and culinary creativity. In addition, we also place a strong emphasis on our beverage program - including a focused wine list comprised of selections from Spain, Chile and Argentina and a cocktail list that consists of faithful classics and our signature combinations.

Catering
Atlanta’s Authentic Brazilian Steakhouse Experience
Located in the heart of Buckhead, Fogo Atlanta features grand dining rooms, white Carrera marble Market Table, soaring wine cases, and semi-private and private dining rooms. Fogo elevates the centuries-old cooking technique of churrasco – the art of roasting high-quality cuts of meat over an open flame – into a cultural dining experience of discovery. Differentiated menus are offered for all dayparts including lunch, dinner, weekend brunch and group dining, plus full-service catering and contactless takeout and delivery options.
Parking
Complimentary valet and self-parking available.
All Day Happy Hour
Join us for All Day Happy Hour at Bar Fogo.
To-Go and Catering
Bring the Fogo experience to you with delivery or pick up.

Cakebread Cellars Wine Dinner
Join us on Thursday, October 9th for a four-course experience featuring a chef-curated Churrasco menu paired with elegant wines from Cakebread Cellars. Make your reservations now, space is limited.
Reserve Now
Fogo Happy Hour. So good, it lasts all day.
We’re offering Happy Hour Specials and Half-Price South American bottles of wine under $130. All Day Every Day. In the dining room and bar. So drop by anytime.
Reserve Now
Group Dining
Learn More
Whether celebrating a special birthday, hosting a large corporate meeting, or a complete buyout of the restaurant, Fogo is the ideal place for groups of all sizes. Our dedicated sales managers will offer a range of customizable menus, package options, private and semi-private dining spaces to suit your needs.
Meeting Planner Friendly

About the Business
*Kitchen Last Call :10:30 PM*

Wagyu House Atlanta redefines Japanese dining with a focus on authentic Yakiniku and sushi. Offering an all-you-can-eat experience, we bring the finest flavors of Japan to your table, featuring A5 Wagyu beef and premium seafood, imported to ensure the highest quality.

Our rooftop setting and lively bar provide the perfect backdrop to savor our carefully crafted dishes. Whether you’re enjoying a meal under the stars or grabbing a bite at the bar, every aspect of your visit is designed to captivate your senses. Discover the true taste of Japanese cuisine at Wagyu House Atlanta, where every moment is a celebration of culinary excellence.

About the Business
5Church Buckhead offers a modern American dining experience that seamlessly blends casual and refined elements. Our menu is driven by technique, and paired with cutting-edge design and genuine hospitality. The atmosphere is truly unique, with a gallery-like feel. The restaurant prominently features local and regional artists, including a ceiling mural of Sun Tzu's "The Art of War" by Atlanta-based artist Dr. Dax. Just like our sister location in Midtown Atlanta, it's a place where you can enjoy great food and art at the same time.
…

ORDER NOW!
Mediterranean food cooked in 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil.
CLICK TO SEE MENU!
ORDER NOW!
PLATES:
CHICKEN SHAWARMA
Our best seller! Halal, hormone-free chicken breast, thinly sliced, grilled with white onions and Turkish spices. Have it as a plate with your choice of 2 sides. Comes with sauce, pita and a complimentary falafel!
order
now
➫
ROSEMARY CHICKEN
Halal, hormone-free baked half chicken! Our Rosemary Chicken is seasoned with 12 different spices and fresh rosemary, cooked only in Olive Oil, and baked slowly to tender perfection! Have it as a plate with your choice of sides, sauce and a complimentary falafel!
order now ➫
FALAFEL
Made 100% in-house, Aviva's falafel is a generational family recipe! We grind garbanzo beans with veggies, herbs, and spices and then fry them in 100% Olive Oil! Have it as a plate with 4 Falafel plus your choice of 3 sides. Comes with tahini and pita too!
order now ➫
SALMON
Scottish Salmon that we fillet in-house daily. Seasoned with Extra Virgin Olive Oil, kosher salt, and black pepper, grilled with peppers, tomatoes, and onions, and garnished with fresh lemon. Have it as a plate with your choice of 2 sides and a complimentary falafel!
order now ➫
LAMB SHAWARMA
Slowly cooked, tender, hormone free, leg of lamb. Have it as a plate with your choice of 2 sides and a complimentary falafel!
order now ➫
WRAPS:
CHICKEN SHAWARMA
Our best seller! Halal, hormone-free chicken breast, thinly sliced, grilled with white onions and Turkish spices. Have it as a wrap as a delicious “on-the-go” meal!
order now ➫
FALAFEL
Made 100% in-house, Aviva's falafel is a generational family recipe! We grind garbanzo beans with veggies, herbs, and spices and then fry them in 100% Olive Oil!
Have it as a wrap as a delicious “on-the-go” meal!
order now ➫
SALMON
Scottish Salmon that we fillet in-house daily. Seasoned with Extra Virgin Olive Oil, kosher salt, and black pepper, grilled with peppers, tomatoes, and onions, and garnished with fresh lemon. Have it as a wrap for a delicious “on-the-go” meal!
order now ➫
LAMB SHAWARMA
Homemade wrap filled with our tender, slowly cooked, hormone free Lamb Shawarma, hummus, baba ghanoush, cabbage salad, tabouli and sauce.
order now ➫
SALADS:
CHICKEN SHAWARMA
Our best seller! Halal, hormone-free chicken breast, thinly sliced, grilled with white onions and Turkish spices. Have it as a salad over a bed of organic greens!
order now ➫
FALAFEL
Made 100% in-house, Aviva's falafel is a generational family recipe! We grind garbanzo beans with veggies, herbs, and spices and then fry them in 100% Olive Oil!
Have it as a salad over a bed of organic greens!
order now ➫
SALMON
Scottish Salmon that we fillet in-house daily. Seasoned with Extra Virgin Olive Oil, kosher salt, and black pepper, grilled with peppers, tomatoes, and onions, and garnished with fresh lemon. Have it as a salad over a bed of organic greens!
order now ➫
LAMB SHAWARMA
Slowly cooked, tender, hormone free, leg of lamb served over organic greens, with hummus, baba ghanoush, cabbage salad, tabouli, and sauce.
order now ➫
SIDES & SOUPS:
HUMMUS & PITA
Our creamy, homemade hummus is made with ground garbanzo beans, fresh-squeezed lemon juice, tahini, kosher salt, and fresh garlic. Served with two loaves of pita.
order now ➫
FALAFEL (5 PIECES)
Made 100% in-house, Aviva's falafel is a generational family recipe! We grind garbanzo beans with veggies, herbs, and spices and then fry them in 100% Olive Oil! 6 of our gluten-free and vegan falafels with tahini sauce on the side.
order now ➫
BABA GHANOUSH & PITA
Creamy roasted eggplant spread with tahini and freshly squeezed lemon juice. Comes with 2 loaves of pita.
order now ➫
PITA
Savor the warmth of Aviva in our house-made pita. Crafted daily with care, each pita wraps the essence of Mediterranean hospitality in its soft, fluffy embrace, promising homemade goodness in every bite.
3 loaves of our warm, fluffy pita bread.
order now ➫
CREAMY CHICKEN SOUP
Our hearty, delicious, Creamy Chicken Soup with 3 different cheeses: squash, zucchini, and broccoli. Served in a 12oz container and comes with bread.
order now ➫
VEGAN BEAN SOUP
Our hearty Vegan Soup with lentils, garbanzos, split peas, and veggies is served in a 12oz portion. Comes with house-made bread.
order now ➫
DESSERTS:
WALNUT BAKLAVA
Our homemade Vegan Baklava made with filo dough, organic maple syrup and olive oil. The only Baklava on earth 100% free of sugar or corn syrup! Comes in two flavors: walnut and pistachio.
order now ➫
SALMON WRAP
Scottish Salmon filleted in house daily, the ultimate “on-the-go” meal!

Reserve A Table
A sophisticated and Timeless Dining Experience in Downtown Atlanta
Serving breakfast, lunch, dinner, and brunch in Peachtree Street’s most elegant dining room, By George offers sophisticated cuisine in the spirit of classic Contemporary American cooking.

Our Menu
Menu
Weekday Specials
Beverages
Beer
Wine
Spirits
Cocktails
Breakfast
We serve breakfast at any time. It's morning somewhere!
Fowl
$8.99
Crushed beans sauteed with our spices and garnished with fresh diced onions, tomatoes, and pepper. Finished with olive oil or butter. Served with pita. Loaded - add feta cheese and a boiled egg or scrambled eggs for an extra $1.75
Scrambled Eggs*
$7.99
Sauteed with onions, tomatoes, pepper and Ethiopian butter. Served with pita. Add a prime ribeye steak for just $7 more.
Chechebsa
$7.99
Small pieces of flatbread braised with berbere and your choice of Ethiopian butter or olive oil.
Kinche
$7.99
Cracked wheat cooked tender with Ethiopian butter and spices.
Breakfast Combo*
$14.99
Our most popular breakfast dish. Includes kinche, scrambled eggs, and chechebsa for 2 or more because sharing is caring. Served with pita, or injera. Add fir fir for just $7 more.
Fetira*
$8.99
Traditional Ethiopian breakfast consisting of flatbread layered with eggs and served with honey.
Brunch
$37.99
If brunch were a party, this would be served! Comes with fir fir, kinche, Ethiopian-styled scrambled eggs, chechebsa, tibs, kitfo and ayib. Served with pita or injera. Serves 2 to 4.
Appetizers
These tasty teasers will definitely make your favs list!
Sambusa
$5.99
Stuffed with your choice of either minced beef or lentils. These crispy treats are to die for!
Tomato Fitfit
$7.99
Diced tomatoes, onions and jalapeno pepper mixed with pieces of injera. Served cold. This is a great dish to share!
Gomen-Siljo Dip
$8.99
A blended dish of tofu and gomen seasoned with garlic, ginger, hot mustard and a touch of olive oil. Served with your choice of injera or pita bread.
Kitfo Wrap*
$9.99
(Beef or Salmon) Injera or tortilla flour wrap filled with our delicious kitfo. Served rare, medium-rare or medium well. Add ayib or peppers for $0.75
Kitfo Slice
$11.99
Tortilla slice filled delicious kitfo, ayib and jalapeno peppers cooked how you like it
Salmon Starter Salad*
$11.99
A fresh to order side portioned salad topped with your choice of rare or cooked salmon and seasoned with Ethiopian spices
Signature Entrees
Spice up any dish w/ awaze for $0.75 | Ask for our  House-made Teff Injera (GF) only $3.99 | Layer your Tibs over Shiro for $2.99 / Make it a Kitfo dulet $1.50
TIBS
$13.49/starts from
Get your taste buds ready for our most popular dish! Tender cubed meat of your choice sauteed in Desta's secret blend of spices, onions, tomatoes, peppers, and spiced olive oil. It doesn't get any yummier than this. 1. Pick Your Meat (9 oz.) | 2. Choose Your Starch | 3. Pick Your Side
1. Pick Your Meat (9 oz.):
Lamb $16.49, Ribeye $17.49, Filet Mignon $19.99, Chicken $14.49, Salmon $16.49, Fish, Tilapia $15.39, Grouper 17.49, Ground Beef $13.99, Shrimp $16.49, Mushroom $13.49. Add gomen, rice, or potatoes to be cooked with your meat for only $1 each.
2. Choose Your Starch:
Injera (3 rolls), Rice, White Bread, Pita Bread, Teff Injera.  Additional injera is $0.50 per roll
3. Pick Your Side:
Salad, Ater, Gomen, Cabbage, Beets & Potato Salad, Potato Stew, Tomato Fitfit, Miser, Mushroom Stew. Add Extra sides for just $2.50
OR... DO YOU LIKE TIBS  A DIFFERENT WAY?
Biret Mitad Tibs
$16.49/starts from
Sautéed cuts of meat at extra-high heat served well done with your choice of side. Lamb $16.49 | Ribeye $17.99 | Filet Mignon $18.49 (cubed or zilzil)
Goden Tibs*
$17.99
Sizzling prime short ribs marinated with Desta sauce, onion, tomato, fresh garlic and jalapeno.
Meat Lovers*
$41.50
MEAT LOVERS BE WARNED! Once you start, you won't stop. Choose any (3) different meats to fill your plate and your stomach. Feeds 2 or more! Pick (3) breads and (3) sides.
KITFO
$14.99
Ethiopian-styled steak tartar, freshly minced extra-lean beef seasoned with mitmita and Ethiopian spiced butter| 1. How Daring are You? “Playing it Safe – served well-done”, “Sorta Brave* - served medium-well”, “Very Brave *– Served medium-rare”, “Dare Devil* - served rare” | 2. Add a Little Something, Something: Ayib $2.50 • Gomen $3.00 • Kocho $5.00 • Shiro $3.00 | Salmon* $16.44 • Make It Kitfo Dulet $1.50
Sandwiches
Looking for a lighter option? Try one of our yummy sandwiches, made fresh daily!
Sandwiches
$10.99/starts from
Lamb $16, Chicken $14, Mushroom $14,  Veggie (Beyond) $10.99,  Kitfo $12.99,  Salmon $17, Shrimp $16, Fish (Tilapia or Grouper) $15.47/$17.47
Pasta
Mama mia! Even though the Italians weren't successful at colonizing Ethiopia, centuries ago: they left their love of pasta, now we're bringing it to you. Sauteed with shiro and tomato based sauce. Served with a salad.
Pasta with Lamb
$18.50

Vegan
Not a meat-eater? Fine, we've got something for everyone! Try one of our vegan dishes.
Shiro (Chickpea Stew)
$13.99
Ground chickpea simmered in a rich house sauce & spiced with olive oil or butter
Tomato Fit Fit
$9.99
Diced tomatoes, onions, and jalapeno peppers, mixed with pieces of injera. Served cold.
Ater( Yellow Split Pea Stew)
$10.99
Yellow split peas stewed in a special sauce with onions, tumeric and ginger.
Miser(Spicy Split Red Lentil Stew)
$12.99
Lentils stewed in a rich berbere sauce with onions, garlic, and ginger.
Tikel Gomen(Cabbage)
$10.99
Fresh cabbage sauteed with onions, garlic, ginger, carrots, and turmeric.
Dinech Wot (Potato stew)
$11.99
Potatoes simmered with berbere, onions, garlic and other spices.
Vegan Platter
$17.99
Shiro, Miser, Ater, Dinech Wot, Gomen, Cabbage, Mushroom, Salad, Azifa, Beets, and Potato salad and Tomato Fit Fit.
Mushroom Stew
$12.99
Sauteed with onions, fresh garlic and fresh ginger.
Gomen
$10.99
Fresh collard greens sauteed with onions, garlic & Tumeric
Specialties
Here are a few honorable mentions we thought you might want to try
Fish Dulet
$15.49
$17.49
Finely minced tilapia or grouper with tomato and onions. Add Shiro for $2.99, $2.00 extra
Works Fir Fir*
$19.00
Firfir served with kitfo, kinche and ayib.
Shiro Fir Fir
$13.99
Chickpeas stewed in a special sauce with onions, garlic and ginger. Served with choice of olive oil or Ethiopian butter.
Gored Gored*
$14.49
Lean beef cubes mixed with mitmita, awaze, onions and peppers. Rare, medium rare or well done.
Salmon Gored Gored
$16.49
Rare or cooked salmon cubes mixed mitmita, awaze, onions, and peppers.
Bozena Shiro*
$14.49
Chickpea stew with your choice of ground or cubed meat or lamb, with butter or olive oil
The "Original Meat-Lovers"
$34.99
Served with kitfo, gored gored and biret mitad tibs.
Potato Stew
$14.49
Cooked  with your choice of ground beef, cubbed meat or lamb, with  butter or olive oil
Fir Fir
$15.00/starts from

About Brooklyn Cafe
Casual, upscale neighborhood dining meets sophisticated American fare. Brooklyn Cafe provides a quality experience down to the last detail while not losing the warmth, familiarity and ease of a favorite neighborhood spot. At Brooklyn Cafe, it is all about food, wine & friends.

Sample Buffet Menu
This is a sample menu and is subject to change based on seasonality and ingredient availability. Our Bottomless Sunday Brunch is chef’s choice and varies weekly to highlight the freshest flavors of the season. Main
Vegetarian
Main
Chef's Special
Chef's Special
Creamy Classic Tori-Paitan
chicken broth, chicken chashu, dehydrated tomato, enoki mushroom tempura, seared corn rib, spinach, butter and chili thread. Served with thick noodles.
Unagi Inari Sushi
grilled eel, shredded egg crepes, cucumber sunomono and top with sesame seed in pockets of deep-fried tofu, simmered in a sweet and savory broth, filled with sushi rice.
Ramen
Ramen
Birria Ramen
Fusion of Mexican Birria and Japanese Ramen! spiced beef and chicken broth, slow-cooked birria beef, red
onion, green onion, cilantro and lime. US LOCATIONS.
Chicken Yuzu Shio Delight
Chicken clear soup: chicken chashu, green onion, spinach, seasoned egg*, nori seaweed with yuzu flavor. Served with thin noodles.
Tan Tan Men
A savory chicken soy broth with a rich sesame essence, includes tender pork soboro, fresh baby bok choy, and vibrant shredded leek, complemented by a touch of chili sesame seeds and drizzled with chili oil and served with thick noodles.
Flying V Harvest
vegan miso broth: Impossible™ meat made from plants, tofu, bean sprouts, broccolini, green onion, corn, red onion, crispy garlic and chili seasoning » served with thick noodles
V Red Fire Opal
Yuzu flavored Hot and Sour soup; tofu, sauteed bamboo shoot, simmered shiitake mushroom, cilantro, chili thread, chili oil and lime >> served with thick noodles.
Spicy Creamy V Ramen
vegetable broth: tofu, onion, green onion, spinach, crispy onion, garlic chips, garlic oil, chili oil and sesame seeds » served with thick noodles
JINYA Chicken Ramen
chicken broth: chicken chashu, spinach, green onion and fried onion » served with thin noodles
Spicy Chicken Ramen
chicken broth: chicken chashu, spinach, spicy bean sprouts and green onion » served with thin noodles (Choose your spice level, MILD, SPICY or HOT.)
Wonton Chicken Ramen
chicken broth: wonton, spinach and green onion » served with thin noodles
JINYA Tonkotsu Black
pork broth: pork chashu, kikurage, green onion, nori dried seaweed, seasoned egg*, garlic chips, garlic oil, fried onion and spicy sauce » served with thin noodles
Premium Tonkotsu Red
pork broth: pork chashu, kikurage, green onion, seasoned egg*, nori dried seaweed, red hot chili oil and spicy bean sprouts » served with thick noodles (Choose your preference of spice level from 1-10. If you choose higher than level 6, an additional $1 will be added.)
JINYA Tonkotsu Original 2010*
Pork broth: pork chashu, green onion, spinach, seasoned egg*, nori dried seaweed. Served with extra thick noodles.
Shrimp Wonton Ramen
pork and shrimp broth: shrimp & chicken wonton, green onion and kikurage » served with thick noodles
Mountain Buta Garlic
Pork broth: pork chashu, wonton, bean sprouts, cabbage, green onion, spinach, seasoned egg*, nori dried seaweed. Served with extra thick noodles. (Available at Select Locations)
Small Plates
Small Plates
French Fries
Shoestring fries with truffle ranch and spicy mayonnaise. (Available at Select Locations)
Aburi Oshi-Sushi Shrimp*
Pressed shrimp sushi, lime zest, JINYA sauce. (Available at Select Locations)
Aburi Oshi-Sushi Salmon*
Pressed salmon sushi, serraro chili, JINYA sauce
Miso Glazed Eggplant
Hokkaido Scallop w/ organic dry miso*
Hokkaido scallop sashimi* with dry miso and yuzu citrus sauce, garnish with crispy garlic, cilantro, cucumber slice and cherry tomato. (Available at Select Locations)
Salmon Jalapeno Sashimi*
Salmon Sashimi* with yuzu soy sauce garnish with serrano chili, cilantro and cherry tomato. (Available at Select Locations)
Corn Tempura
Corn tempura with broccolini. Served with tempura sauce.

Steamed meat bun (1pc)

Impossible™ meat made from plants.

crispy tempura brussels sprouts with white truffle oil

lightly salted boiled soy beans

Flavorful garlic shrimp tucked inside a spring roll wrapper
Pork Gyoza (6 pcs)
handmade pork potstickers
JINYA Bun
steamed bun stuffed with slow-braised pork chashu, cucumber and baby mixed greens served with JINYA’s original bun sauce and Kewpie mayonnaise
Impossible™ Bun
plant-base bun: Impossible™ meat made from plants, guacamole, cucumber with vegan mayonnaise. Vegetarian
Crispy Chicken
juicy fried chicken thigh served with mixed baby greens and JINYA’s original ponzu sauce
Takoyaki - Octopus Ball -
battered octopus over egg tartar topped with kewpie mayonnaise, okonomiyaki sauce, fresh cut green onion and smoked bonito flakes
Spicy Creamy Shrimp Tempura
crispy shrimp tempura tossed in JINYA’s original spicy mayonnaise done in the classic “ebi-mayo” style
Crispy Rice with Spicy Tuna
crispy grilled sushi rice topped with spicy tuna. garnished with sliced Serrano pepper
Sautéed Broccolini
Sautéed broccolini with crispy white quinoa.

Mini Tacos

Salads
Salads
Crunchy Cucumber Salad
Marinated cucumber with kombu sesame dashi. Topped with sesame seed and chili powder. (Available at Select Locations)
Chicken Salad
Tender and juicy chicken breast with diced red onion, cucumber, and dressed with creamy sauce. Serve with crispy wonton chips.
House Salad
Kale and baby mix green with Japanese dressing. Vegetarian.
Seaweed Salad
lightly seasoned mixed seaweed salad with baby mixed greens. (Available at Select Locations)
Rice Bowls & Curry
Rice Bowls & Curry

Slow-braised pork chashu, kikurage namul, simmered shiitake mushroom, green onion, seasoned egg* and sesame seeds.
Chicken Chashu Bowl*
Slow-braised chicken breast 'chashu', ground chicken soboro, kikurage namul, simmered shiitake mushroom, green onion, seasoned egg* and sesame seeds.
Impossible™ Rice Bowl
Impossible™ meat made from plants, crispy chickpeas, kale, pickled red cabbage, crispy garlic, roasted pine nuts over steamed rice with vegan curry ranch dressing.
Salmon Poke Bowl* (Sml.)
Poke marinated salmon* and onion over steamed rice. Garnished with green onion and sesame seed.
Tokyo Curry Rice
Tokyo style curry with ground chicken and steamed rice.

About the Business
Business owner information
Nick B.
Business Owner
Hattie B’s Hot Chicken serves up Nashville’s most legendary hot chicken with heat levels for everyone, from Southern (no heat) to Shut the Cluck Up (try it if you dare). Family-owned and proudly rooted in Music City, we’re known for crispy, juicy chicken, made-to-order sides, cold local beer, and a whole lot of Southern hospitality. Whether you’re a hot chicken rookie or a spice warrior, Hattie B’s is where you come to taste Nashville’s fiery flavor and feel right at home.

American Continental Cuisine With Modern Flair
The Betty is a New American supper club that pays tribute to the continental menus of yesteryear. But while the recipes may sound comfortingly familiar, Chef’s approach is decidedly 21st century. Pair your entrée with a timeless cocktail, a selection from our robust wine list or an Atlanta-crafted beer.

ORDER ONLINE
INFORMATION
Our Menus
We buy the freshest ingredients we can find.
We cook seasonally because that’s what is fresh and best. We support local farmers and businesses whenever we can, because it’s the right thing to do and the best flavor naturally follows. We believe that great food is best enjoyed with friends and family. We try to be “green” whenever we can. We believe in sustainability, both environmentally and fiscally. In the end, it all comes back to that little mantra:
you can’t argue with delicious.
Our chefs like to keep things fresh (literally). The menus online are a solid guide, but not a legally binding document. The offerings below may be subject to change.

Wylie & Rum’s Catering Menu offers a vibrant selection of Cuban and Caribbean-inspired dishes, perfect for any event. From flavorful appetizers to hearty entrees and delicious desserts, our menu showcases the island flavors you love. 8oz patty of ground brisket and sirloin grilled with jerk spices on a toasted H&F brioche bun with a fried egg, jerk bacon, Swiss cheese, tobacco onions, lettuce, tomato and habanero aioli served with a side of fries. Substitute ghost pepper cheese $2 | Add grilled pineapple $1
Miami Cuban
$16.49
Cuban bread from La Segunda Bakery stuffed with our mojo pork, sweet ham, Swiss cheese, yellow mustard and pickles pressed until perfectly crispy and served with a side of yellow rice and black beans topped with pico de gallo and sour cream. Substitute fries $3
Cap-Haitian Special
$19.95
Crispy fried chicken breast brined in Red Stripe and served on top of a Dutch waffle with rum butter and spiced syrup.
Havana Caesar
$12.95
Chopped romaine tossed in an avocado caesar dressing topped with adobo croutons and crispy plantain chips. Add protein: Jerk chicken $5 | Grilled Salmon $9 | Grilled Shrimp $7
Tradewinds Cobb
$14.95
Mixed lettuces tossed in mango poppyseed dressing and topped with, tomato, cucumber, red onion, jerk spiced bacon, habanero jack cheese, diced mango and a boiled egg.
Kingston B.L.T.A.
$16.95
Grilled jerk marinated chicken breast on Texas toast with crispy jerk bacon, lettuce, tomato, sliced avocado and habanero aioli.
Kids Waffle with Bacon
$8.95
Served with your choice of eggs, grits or a fruit bowl

Atlanta, GA (Lenox Square)
Isaiah DeBenedetto
2025-01-11T15:28:37-07:00
hello, atlanta.
we’re ready to treat you to real food & serious flavor.
Location & Hours
Download Menu
Group Dining
Catering Menu
Seasonal Menu
At True Food Kitchen, our menu is carefully crafted so that every bite and every refreshing sip serve up big flavor, an abundance of fresh ingredients and a taste of the unexpected. Our artisan chefs create crave-worthy classics alongside a steady rotation of seasonal offerings that take advantage of naturally ripe fruits and vegetables so their flavor is full and their nutrients, rich. Creative, hand-crafted beverages built around seasonality, quality ingredients and simple preparations complement every occasion from brunch, lunch, dinner and, of course, dessert. Always room for dessert.
Important Information About Our Menu
Menu pricing varies by location – to view location-specific menus, visit our
locations
page.
*These items may be served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
Please be aware that our restaurants use gluten and ingredients that contain all the major FDA allergens (peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, milk, sesame, soy and wheat).
Our restaurants have shared cooking and preparation areas and the possibility exists for food items to come into contact with other food products. Due to these circumstances, we are unable to guarantee that any menu item can be completely free of allergens. In addition, while effort is made to keep our product information current and as complete as possible, it is possible that ingredient changes and substitutions may occur due to differences in regional suppliers, recipe revisions, preparation techniques, and/or the season of the year.
Before placing your order, please inform your server if someone in your party has a food allergy or a special dietary need and we will do our best to make accommodations.
View our nutritional guide
here
.
hours & location
True Food Kitchen restaurant is located at Lenox Square
Visit our Atlanta restaurant to dine in or order online for pickup or delivery.

About the Business
It is not any Mediterranean food you had experienced  , it’s the best.  So very fresh and top quality. Top of the line meats,chicken,lamb ,seafood. So authentic so flavorful and juicy.  Try us you won’t regret it. and the concept is one of a kind in Georgia yet.

ORDER NOW!
Mediterranean food cooked in 100% Extra Virgin Olive Oil.
CLICK TO SEE MENU!
ORDER NOW!
PLATES:
CHICKEN SHAWARMA
Our best seller! Halal, hormone-free chicken breast, thinly sliced, grilled with white onions and Turkish spices. Have it as a plate with your choice of 2 sides. Comes with sauce, pita and a complimentary falafel!
order
now
➫
ROSEMARY CHICKEN
Halal, hormone-free baked half chicken! Our Rosemary Chicken is seasoned with 12 different spices and fresh rosemary, cooked only in Olive Oil, and baked slowly to tender perfection! Have it as a plate with your choice of sides, sauce and a complimentary falafel!
order now ➫
FALAFEL
Made 100% in-house, Aviva's falafel is a generational family recipe! We grind garbanzo beans with veggies, herbs, and spices and then fry them in 100% Olive Oil! Have it as a plate with 4 Falafel plus your choice of 3 sides. Comes with tahini and pita too!
order now ➫
SALMON
Scottish Salmon that we fillet in-house daily. Seasoned with Extra Virgin Olive Oil, kosher salt, and black pepper, grilled with peppers, tomatoes, and onions, and garnished with fresh lemon. Have it as a plate with your choice of 2 sides and a complimentary falafel!
order now ➫
LAMB SHAWARMA
Slowly cooked, tender, hormone free, leg of lamb. Have it as a plate with your choice of 2 sides and a complimentary falafel!
order now ➫
WRAPS:
CHICKEN SHAWARMA
Our best seller! Halal, hormone-free chicken breast, thinly sliced, grilled with white onions and Turkish spices. Have it as a wrap as a delicious “on-the-go” meal!
order now ➫
FALAFEL
Made 100% in-house, Aviva's falafel is a generational family recipe! We grind garbanzo beans with veggies, herbs, and spices and then fry them in 100% Olive Oil!
Have it as a wrap as a delicious “on-the-go” meal!
order now ➫
SALMON
Scottish Salmon that we fillet in-house daily. Seasoned with Extra Virgin Olive Oil, kosher salt, and black pepper, grilled with peppers, tomatoes, and onions, and garnished with fresh lemon. Have it as a wrap for a delicious “on-the-go” meal!
order now ➫
LAMB SHAWARMA
Homemade wrap filled with our tender, slowly cooked, hormone free Lamb Shawarma, hummus, baba ghanoush, cabbage salad, tabouli and sauce.
order now ➫
SALADS:
CHICKEN SHAWARMA
Our best seller! Halal, hormone-free chicken breast, thinly sliced, grilled with white onions and Turkish spices. Have it as a salad over a bed of organic greens!
order now ➫
FALAFEL
Made 100% in-house, Aviva's falafel is a generational family recipe! We grind garbanzo beans with veggies, herbs, and spices and then fry them in 100% Olive Oil!
Have it as a salad over a bed of organic greens!
order now ➫
SALMON
Scottish Salmon that we fillet in-house daily. Seasoned with Extra Virgin Olive Oil, kosher salt, and black pepper, grilled with peppers, tomatoes, and onions, and garnished with fresh lemon. Have it as a salad over a bed of organic greens!
order now ➫
LAMB SHAWARMA
Slowly cooked, tender, hormone free, leg of lamb served over organic greens, with hummus, baba ghanoush, cabbage salad, tabouli, and sauce.
order now ➫
SIDES & SOUPS:
HUMMUS & PITA
Our creamy, homemade hummus is made with ground garbanzo beans, fresh-squeezed lemon juice, tahini, kosher salt, and fresh garlic. Served with two loaves of pita.
order now ➫
FALAFEL (5 PIECES)
Made 100% in-house, Aviva's falafel is a generational family recipe! We grind garbanzo beans with veggies, herbs, and spices and then fry them in 100% Olive Oil! 6 of our gluten-free and vegan falafels with tahini sauce on the side.
order now ➫
BABA GHANOUSH & PITA
Creamy roasted eggplant spread with tahini and freshly squeezed lemon juice. Comes with 2 loaves of pita.
order now ➫
PITA
Savor the warmth of Aviva in our house-made pita. Crafted daily with care, each pita wraps the essence of Mediterranean hospitality in its soft, fluffy embrace, promising homemade goodness in every bite.
3 loaves of our warm, fluffy pita bread.
order now ➫
CREAMY CHICKEN SOUP
Our hearty, delicious, Creamy Chicken Soup with 3 different cheeses: squash, zucchini, and broccoli. Served in a 12oz container and comes with bread.
order now ➫
VEGAN BEAN SOUP
Our hearty Vegan Soup with lentils, garbanzos, split peas, and veggies is served in a 12oz portion. Comes with house-made bread.
order now ➫
DESSERTS:
WALNUT BAKLAVA
Our homemade Vegan Baklava made with filo dough, organic maple syrup and olive oil. The only Baklava on earth 100% free of sugar or corn syrup! Comes in two flavors: walnut and pistachio.
order now ➫
SALMON WRAP
Scottish Salmon filleted in house daily, the ultimate “on-the-go” meal!

Brunch Menu
Savor shakshuka, avocado toast with za'atar, and more, served with warm pita bread. Join us every weekend for a delicious brunch experience like no other!
View menu
SCROLL DOWN
Lunch Menu
Join us every workday for an exquisite culinary journey that will elevate your lunchtime experience. Indulge in a mouthwatering selection of grilled meats, bursting with smoky flavors that will leave your taste buds dancing with delight.
View menu
Dinner Menu
Savor the magic of Mediterranean cuisine with our delectable dinner menu, available every day. Indulge in a delightful fusion of fresh, flavorful ingredients that bring classic dishes like hummus, grilled lamb chops, and seafood paella to life. Join us for a culinary adventure that will leave your taste buds dancing with delight!
View menu
CATERING Menu
Experience the tastes and aromas of the Mediterranean with our catering menu, featuring an array of delicious options such as lamb kebabs, falafel wraps, and spinach pie, perfect for any event or occasion.
View menu

BEVERAGE MENU
Discover refreshing flavors with our beverage selection, featuring handcrafted drinks inspired by Mediterranean traditions â from fresh-squeezed juices and aromatic teas to rich Turkish coffee and sparkling water, ideal for any gathering or celebration.

About the Business
Elektra is the coastal Mediterranean restaurant and bar alongside the terrace pool at FORTH Hotel in Atlanta. Curated by award-winning Executive Chef Jonathan McDowell, the menu offers entrees ranging from New York strip shish kabobs to mussels and merguez, side dishes and shareables like prawns, hummus, and labneh, and a full menu of refreshing cocktails crafted for sipping poolside.

raw_text:
Menu  –   Persepolis Persian Cuisine
Persepolis Persian Cuisine
Follow Us on Twitter
Join Us on Facebook!
Menu
Photo Gallery
Reservation

Menu
Lunch & Dinner Menu
Appetizers
* All entrees are served with your choice of Saffron flavored, white steamed Basmati rice or lentil rice, fresh homemade bread, char-broiled tomato, and a side order of fresh herbs, onion and butter.
* Any of our Basmati rice can be substituted for salad or mixed Basmati rice (sour cherry rice, lentil raisin rice, barberry rice and Lima bean dill rice) for an additional $3.99.
* Entrees are mandatory on Fridays and Saturdays.
* Consuming Raw or Undercooked Meats, Poultry, or Eggs May Increase Your Risk of Food Bourne Illness*
*18% Service Charge will be added to all Tables.
Tahdig
11.99
Literally translated bottom of the pot. Crispy layer of rice topped with stew of the day. Most popular on any Persian dinner table.
Borani Spinach
8.99
A smooth blend of sautéed spinach, onions & yogurt
Hummus
8.99

Vegetarian Selections

21.99

Vegetarian Albaloo Polo
21.99
Basmati rice steamed with cooked glazed-pitted sour cherries topped with saffron. Served with a skewer of charbroiled vegetable kabob (sweet mini peppers, portabella mushrooms, zucchini, squash, pineapple, onions and tomato)
Vegetarian Zereshk Polo

Basmati rice, steam cooked with barberries which are sautéed in a special glazed saffron sauce. A sweet and sour dish with a skewer of vegetable kabob (sweet mini peppers, portabella mushrooms, zucchini, squash, pineapple, onions and tomato)
Charbroiled Vegetable Kabob
21.99
One skewer of charbroiled sweet peppers, portabella mushrooms, zucchini, squash, pineapple, onions and tomato grilled on open fire served with butter and saffron Basmati rice.
Desserts

Testimonials
Best Persian on the East Coast. Alway have the lamb rack. Seasoned and cooked to tender perfection with saffron rice and roast tomato. Their complementary hot flat bread (ask for it crispy) with feta, basil and radishes are a treat! The grape leaves delish. 

If you have enough appetite (or a large group) get the rice pot bottom with meat sauce appetizer. A meal in itself! Finish off with the homemade rosewater ice cream. 

Simple family-style and friendly environment. Ocassional bellydancer…
A.P
I was there for the buffet and was treated well by the staff. I am african american, I do speak some Farsi, but they were not aware of that at first, They came right over and explained the menu and service. (maybe it has changed owners?) My favorite item is torshi with my food. the rice dishes are awesome. I will return .I am aware of their cultural issues. Forwardness/rudeness is an un -comfortable issue for any culture.
Reba Kashef
I absolutely love Persepolis, a great Persian restaurant that provides high quality food and excellent service/entertainment. Jessica is a great belly dancer and compliments the beautiful servers and cozy ambience of this wonderful restaurant. George, Shaun and Tony are about as nice a management team as you’ll find in any restaurant, and they treat the customers at Persepolis like family. Persepolis delivers…whether you’re looking to go out for a romantic dinner or having a big party, this is t…
Steve
Who doesn’t like giant well seasoned mea t kebabs? At Persepolis, the main show is the wonderfully seasoned meats, shrimp and chicken. When I went, everything was near perfect. The chicken was a little dry, but the tender and juicy beef made up for it. To start they bring out some fresh baked Persian bread, with some nuts and cheese. There was also an eggplant salad that we ordered, that may have been the best thing having to do with eggplants I have ever had. If you are in the mood for Persian …
Ravenous

Who doesn’t like giant well seasoned mea t kebabs? At Persepolis, the main show is the wonderfully seasoned meats, shrimp and chicken. When I went, everything was near perfect. The chicken was a little dry, but the tender and juicy beef made up for it. To start they bring out some fresh baked Persian bread, with some nuts and cheese. There was also an eggplant salad that we ordered, that may have been the best thing having to do with eggplants I have ever had. If you are in the mood for Persian …
Ravenous
Best Persian on the East Coast. Alway have the lamb rack. Seasoned and cooked to tender perfection with saffron rice and roast tomato. Their complementary hot flat bread (ask for it crispy) with feta, basil and radishes are a treat! The grape leaves delish. 

If you have enough appetite (or a large group) get the rice pot bottom with meat sauce appetizer. A meal in itself! Finish off with the homemade rosewater ice cream. 

Simple family-style and friendly environment. Ocassional bellydancer…
A.P
I absolutely love Persepolis, a great Persian restaurant that provides high quality food and excellent service/entertainment. Jessica is a great belly dancer and compliments the beautiful servers and cozy ambience of this wonderful restaurant. George, Shaun and Tony are about as nice a management team as you’ll find in any restaurant, and they treat the customers at Persepolis like family. Persepolis delivers…whether you’re looking to go out for a romantic dinner or having a big party, this is t…
Steve
I was there for the buffet and was treated well by the staff. I am african american, I do speak some Farsi, but they were not aware of that at first, They came right over and explained the menu and service. (maybe it has changed owners?) My favorite item is torshi with my food. the rice dishes are awesome. I will return .I am aware of their cultural issues. Forwardness/rudeness is an un -comfortable issue for any culture.
Reba Kashef

See Our Menu
If you are in Atlanta seeking a raw vegan restaurant, Tassili’s Raw Reality can nourish you with a unique variety of delicious raw vegan experiences. We are faster than full-service restaurants, healthier than fast-food restaurants, and provide more variety of raw vegan foods than most vegan and vegetarian restaurants.
Wraps
Choose your Kale Wisely
Mild, Mixed or Spicy
Choose your Wrap
Chili, Spinach has (Soy and Wheat Gluten) or Seaweed (no Soy and Wheat Gluten)
Punany Wrap
A spinach tortilla wrap kissed with soy-free vegan mayo, packed with your choice of spicy, mild or ,mixed kale, sweet coconut corn, karamu couscous and finished with fresh avocado and tomatoes.
This wrap comes in half size- $12.49, full size-$19.49 and salad form-$16.49
South of the Border Wrap
A chili tortilla wrap kissed with Black Eyed Pea Hummus, packed with your choice of spicy, mild or ,mixed kale, Moroccan couscous and finished with extra fresh avocado and tomatoes.
This wrap come in half size- $13.49, full size- $20.49 and salad form-$17.49
Mandingo Wrap
The name says it all!! A huge spinach tortilla wrap kissed with soy-free vegan mayo, packed with your choice of spicy, mild or mixed kale, finished with fresh avocado and tomatoes and topped with a drizzle of agave, hemp seeds and sliced almonds.
This wrap comes in one size- $35.99 and salad form- $31.99 on Seaweed $39.99
Big Yoshi
For those that like it totally raw. The BIG Yoshi is a nori seaweed wrap, packed with your choice of spicy, mild or mixed kale, karamu couscous, pad thai noodles, finished with fresh avocado and tomatoes and drizzled with our signature Raw-B-Q sauce.
This wrap comes in one size- $15.49 and salad form- $15.49
Dat ISH
A spinach tortilla wrap kissed with soy-free vegan mayo, packed with your choice of spicy, mild or ,mixed kale, sweet relish, battered mushrooms and finished with fresh avocado and tomatoes.
This wrap comes in one size- $16.49 and salad form- $16.49
THE “OG” Original Kale
A spinach tortilla wrap kissed with soy-free vegan mayo, packed with your choice of spicy, mild or ,mixed kale and finished with fresh avocado and tomatoes.
This wrap comes in half size-$10.49, full size-$16.40 and salad form-$15.49
Alapoopoolala Avocado Kale
A spinach tortilla kissed with soy-free vegan mayo packed with TRR’s yeast free version of our OG kale salad recipe massaged with fresh avocado, topped with fresh tomatoes.
This wrap comes in half size- $14.99 or full size- $21.49 or in salad form- $16.49
Raw Specials
Soups (Seasonal)
Raw Delectables
Spicy Kale Salad™
Fresh kale, red onion, sun-dried tomatoes, spices and, of course, the love that brings it all together…
Mild Kale Salad™
The Spicy Kale Salad without the heat…
Way Better Than Ok–Ra™
Think all okra has to be slimy? Think again! A medley of sliced okra, sun-dried tomatoes, corn, onion, and spices…
Karamu Couscous™
A fluffy, festival of couscous, raisins, and berries…
Moroccan Couscous™
A vibrant blend of couscous, black olives, and spices…
Sweet Coconut Corn™
Sweet kernel corn and refreshing coconut milk.
Pad Thai Noodles™
Peanut ginger sauce, rice noodles, garnished with a sprinkle of peanuts, herb, cilantro, and scallions.
Black-eyed Pea Hummus™
A thick puree of black-eyed peas, sesame butter and spices served with bok choy or carrot spears…
Curried Plantains™
Plantains mixed with a powerful punch of curry and accented with bell peppers and agave.
Mixed Kale Salad
Kale is one of nature’s most nutritionally complete foods. Tassili’s OG salad is a flavorful blend of fresh kale, red onions, sun dried tomatoes, olive oil, texturized vegetable protein and a blend of spices and of course love to bring it all together.
Black Love Stew
Forbidden black rice soaked to tenderness, covered in a sensually, savory gravy made of portobello mushrooms, red, green and yellow bell peppers, red onions and delicious blend of seasonings.
Mango Mushroom Stew
This seasonal sweet and tart stew is filled with fresh sliced mango, portobello mushrooms, bell peppers, red onions and a hint of cilantro.
Carrot Tuna
Plant based and missing your tuna salad?
Try our version made with fresh carrot pulp, soy free vegan mayo, celery, pickles and a blendof spices.
Battered Mushrooms
This unassuming super food is coated in olive oil and battered in spices and love.
Battered Cauliflower
This unassuming super food is coated in olive oil and battered in spices and love.
Snacks
African Carob Cake $10.50
This raw dessert is our take on the German Chocolate cake. We mix carob powder with organic almond butter, chopped almonds and sweetened with agave. Then topped with a blend of shredded coconut, sliced almonds and a fresh strawberry.
Carob Climax Brownie $6.00
This raw brownie is made from mixing almond butter, carob powder, maple syrup and sliced almonds.
Strawberry Cream Pie $11.50
This raw delight is made with fresh strawberries blended with almond butter and agave, atop a spiced almond and flax mill pie crust.
Very Berry Pie $11.50
This raw delight is made with fresh strawberries, blueberries, blackberries and raspberries blended with agave, atop a spiced almond and flax mill pie crust.
Banana Coconut Cream Pie
$11.50
This raw creamy banana goodness is a blend of fresh bananas, shredded coconut and agave nectar on top of our spiced flax and almond mill crust.
Mango Cream Pie (Seasonal) $11.50
This creaming tropical dessert is a delicious blend of fresh mangos, organic almond butter, agave nectar set on top of fresh mango slices and our spiced flax and almond mill crust.
Apple Pie (Seasonal) $11.50
This raw apple treat is the perfect blend of fresh apples, agave nectar and spices covering our spiced flax and almond milk crust topped with crushed walnuts.
Sweet Potato Pie (seasonal) $11.50
Loving Pumpkin spice anything, well your bound to love this raw blend of fresh sweet potatoes, maple syrup and spices covering our spiced flax and almond milk crust.
Spicy Popolicious Popcorn $8.00
Mild Popolicious Popcorn $8.00
Mixed Popolicious Popcorn $10.00
Moringa Popolicious Popcorn $9.00

Our Menus
Zafron Restaurant
Indulge in Zafron Restaurant's Exquisite Menu
At Zafron Restaurant, we take pride in offering a diverse and delectable selection of dishes and beverages to satisfy every palate. Whether you're joining us for a leisurely lunch, an elegant dinner, or simply to enjoy a drink or dessert, our menu is crafted with the finest ingredients and a passion for excellence.
Additionally, we offer
catering services
for any number of people, ensuring your event is a delicious success. Our dishes are made fresh to order ingredients to provide the highest quality experience. For more details on our catering services or to arrange a delivery, please
give us a call
.
Our team is ready to assist you in making your dining experience exceptional. We look forward to serving you!

Shawarma Press Brief:
Shawarma Press is the ultimate destination for shawarma lovers who crave authenticity and innovation in every bite. We are a modern, fast, and fresh Mediterranean eatery that redefines the shawarma experience with a perfect blend of tradition and creativity. At Shawarma Press, we use only the finest premium beef and all-natural chicken, ensuring every bite is packed with flavor. Our falafels and hummus are made from scratch, crafted with the freshest ingredients to bring you a taste that’s as authentic as it is extraordinary

Our Menu

ORDER NOW
Menu
Street Food. Real Food.
Street Pitas
Street Pita comes with lettuce, tomato, onion, one side, and your choice of protein and sauce.
Options are Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Pita Platters
Platters comes with a base of rice and choice of one side.
Protein options include Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Bowls
Served on a base of seasoned rice and side with garlic Pita.
Served with lettuce, tomato, onions, and your choice of protein and sauce.
Options are Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Salads
Base of Harvest Blend. Served with Garlic Pita.
Packed with Lettuce, Tomato, Onion, Cucumber, Feta, Olives, Garbanzo beans and option to add your protein of choice: Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Greek Fries
Seasoned fries, crumbled feta, Parsley topped with street and house sauce. Option to top them with Steak or Gyro meat.
Starters
Let's start the party with your choice of Spanakopita, Gyro, Chicken or Cheese rolls, Traditional, Red Pepper or Harissa Hummus, Falafel starter, or Veggie Grape leaves.
Kids
All Kids Meals come with one side, dessert, and drink. Choose between Kids Gyro, Kids Chicken tenders, Kids Cheese Pita, or Kids Cheese rolls.
Desserts
Choose between our Baklava, Baklava Cheesecake, Knafeh, or Brownies.
Sauces
We have a flavor for everyone! Choose between Tzatziki, Spicy Tzatziki, Curry sauce, House sauce, Street sauce, Garlic, Tahini, or Greek Dressing.

Long Live Pasha !
Pasha Restaurant & Bar serves Mediterranean cuisine with craft cocktails, located at Buckhead, Atlanta, Georgia.
We have reinvented Atlanta’s dining experience with top notch food service and Live DJ Performance.
This is your destination for any celebration with an elegant 8,000-square-foot venue including a Speakeasy Lounge and a temperature controlled specious patio with retractable awning system.

DIBAR GRILL
We are the only place in Georgia baking authentic and fresh Sangak Bread daily, so it certainly is another reason for you to try Persian flavors at DiBAR Grill. We have also had a lot of people asking what is Sangak bread. Its name consists of two parts, Sang in Persian means Stone or Pebble and Sangak means little stone. The bread is baked on a small bed of river stones in an oven. Sangak bread was traditionally the bread of the Persian Royal family and the earliest mention of this bread dates back to the 19th century! Sangak Bread is eaten along with Lamb Kabab.

raw_text:

99 KROG STREET
ATLANTA, GA 30307
404.506.9999
Part of the Rye Restaurants family, Yalla is a modern Middle Eastern food stall at
Krog Street
Market
from Chef Todd Ginsberg, Shelley Sweet, and Jennifer & Ben Johnson, the team behind
The General Muir
,
Fred’s Meat & Bread
, and
Wood’s Chapel BBQ
. Yalla serves bowls, pita, and laffa (think, burrito) stuffed with favorites like herb-filled falafel, chicken shawarma, and Moroccan-spiced beef kofta.
Name
*
First Name
Last Name
Email
*
Subject
*
Message
*
Thank you!
“Sabich Pita at Yalla: No offense to the falafel or shawarma, but there’s one sandwich that stands above all others in the canon of Israeli cuisine, and that is the sabich pita. The foundation is fried eggplant, and Yalla has mastered the art, producing slices that are tender, smoky and dare we say, meaty? But the secret ingredient is the neon orange amba, made from mango and sundry spices. As with all Yalla dishes, feel free to customize, but the standard sabich composition with hummus, labne, tahini and hard-boiled egg is practically perfect.”
“100 Dishes to Eat in Atlanta Now”, Creative Loafing
April 20, 2017

Help us spread the word about
La Shish
Enjoyed your experience at La Shish almost as much as we enjoyed having you?
Write us a review on YELP or GOOGLE to spread the word about our delicious food
and five star service. We appreciate it and hope to see you again soon!
YELP
GOOGLE
TESTIMONIALS
What Our Visitors Say
“This place is amazing! The food is fresh and fantastic. The lamb chops are incredible as well as the gyro plate. I also love the lentil soup. The people are really nice and aim to please, and the prices are very reasonable. You will not be disappointed!”
Berry J.
YELP REVIEW
TESTIMONIALS
What Our Visitors Say
“Very good Greek food, tasty and good servings. The staff is friendly and the prices are decent as well, there is also plenty of parking and the location is close to the airport.”
Ann P.
YELP REVIEW
TESTIMONIALS
What Our Visitors Say
“Delicious food, and fantastic environment. Passing through while traveling, and didn’t have anything specific in mind. Sorted by rating, and hit a jackpot. I’ve never had falafel before, but it was good. Reminds me of hush puppies, which I don’t like. Hush puppies have always given me the impression of being leftover fish breading dropped into a frier. In contrast, the falafel has a satisfying blend of textures, with a mild flavor. The sauce(?) it comes with paired perfectly.
I got the shish tawook plate, which was even better. I was curious about something that marinated chicken in yogurt, and I wasn’t disappointed. The chicken was moist with plenty of seasoning. It went well with the tzatziki sauce when I put it in the pita bread with my salad.”
Rissa H.
YELP REVIEW
TESTIMONIALS
What Our Visitors Say
“La Shish Kabob is amazing!!! Each time we visit Atlanta I make sure to stop by La Shish Kabob to get some of their amazing food. I’ve had several of their amazing dishes including Chicken Kafta, Lamb Loins, and the Shrimp. The Chicken was marinated to perfection and very juicy. The Lamb may be my favorite I’ve ever had as it was juicy, tender, and super flavorful. The Shrimp were delicious too. The salad was fresh and the dressing was delicious. The rice was so good and not at all dry like most rice usually is when you get it at restaurants. The hummus was fresh and creamy, you could tell it was made in house. I would totally recommend this wonderful restaurant for delicious Mediterranean cuisine. To top the beautiful and flavorful food off, the owners were so nice and made me feel so welcome.”
Candice B.
GOOGLE REVIEW

info@lashishkabab.com

1155 Virginia Ave Suite E
Hapeville, GA 30354
