About the Business
Located in 1193 Collier Road NW Suite A, Pera Atlanta offers a vibrant and modern take on Mediterranean  cuisine. Dishes are inspired by the flavors of the Mediterranean region, with an emphasis on fresh ingredients and bold flavors. We aim to provide top-quality Mediterranean cuisine at your restaurant, we  focus on customer service. We Utilize Genuine Recipes. We Incorporate authentic recipes that embody the flavors and cooking methods of Mediterranean gastronomy. We offer traditional dishes from regions such as Greece, Italy, Spain, Turkey, and Lebanon. Pera Atlanta  ensures the utmost flavor and quality in your dishes by sourcing fresh, high-quality ingredients.  We support local farmers and guarantee freshness by using locally sourced produce, meats, seafood, and spices whenever possible.  We showcase the vastness and richness of Mediterranean cuisine through a diverse menu. We include a wide range of appetizers, salads, mezes, entrees, and desserts that highlight the classic ingredients and flavors of the Mediterranean.

Barrel Room Menu
Enjoy a Mediterranean influenced dinner in our Barrel Room restaurant in Downtown Atlanta. Menu highlights include our Grilled Hanger Steak, Marinated Chicken Thigh, Garlic Shrimp, Greek Sliders, variety of Flatbread Pizzas, Wine Flights, Handcrafted Cocktails, and much more!

Concert Dining Menu
Dine during your show! Your ticket is your dinner reservation. We recommend arriving an hour before your show to enjoy a relaxed meal and drinks before and during the show.

Street Food. Real Food.
Street Pitas
Street Pita comes with lettuce, tomato, onion, one side, and your choice of protein and sauce.
Options are Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Pita Platters
Platters comes with a base of rice and choice of one side.
Protein options include Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Bowls
Served on a base of seasoned rice and side with garlic Pita.
Served with lettuce, tomato, onions, and your choice of protein and sauce.

Salads
Base of Harvest Blend. Served with Garlic Pita.
Packed with Lettuce, Tomato, Onion, Cucumber, Feta, Olives, Garbanzo beans and option to add your protein of choice: Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Greek Fries
Seasoned fries, crumbled feta, Parsley topped with street and house sauce. Option to top them with Steak or Gyro meat.
Starters
Let's start the party with your choice of Spanakopita, Gyro, Chicken or Cheese rolls, Traditional, Red Pepper or Harissa Hummus, Falafel starter, or Veggie Grape leaves.
Kids
All Kids Meals come with one side, dessert, and drink. Choose between Kids Gyro, Kids Chicken tenders, Kids Cheese Pita, or Kids Cheese rolls.
Desserts
Choose between our Baklava, Baklava Cheesecake, Knafeh, or Brownies.
Sauces
We have a flavor for everyone! Choose between Tzatziki, Spicy Tzatziki, Curry sauce, House sauce, Street sauce, Garlic, Tahini, or Greek Dressing.

TIBS
$13.49/starts from
Get your taste buds ready for our most popular dish! Tender cubed meat of your choice sauteed in Desta's secret blend of spices, onions, tomatoes, peppers, and spiced olive oil. It doesn't get any yummier than this. 1. Pick Your Meat (9 oz.) | 2. Choose Your Starch | 3. Pick Your Side
1. Pick Your Meat (9 oz.):
Lamb $16.49, Ribeye $17.49, Filet Mignon $19.99, Chicken $14.49, Salmon $16.49, Fish, Tilapia $15.39, Grouper 17.49, Ground Beef $13.99, Shrimp $16.49, Mushroom $13.49. Add gomen, rice, or potatoes to be cooked with your meat for only $1 each.
2. Choose Your Starch:
Injera (3 rolls), Rice, White Bread, Pita Bread, Teff Injera.  Additional injera is $0.50 per roll
3. Pick Your Side:
Salad, Ater, Gomen, Cabbage, Beets & Potato Salad, Potato Stew, Tomato Fitfit, Miser, Mushroom Stew. Add Extra sides for just $2.50

About the Business
Sheesh Mediterranean | Fresh Ingredients, Bold Flavors, Healthy Eating

Sheesh features fresh, healthy Mediterranean cuisine using simple, wholesome ingredients that are prepared with unique flavors and spices. Our inspiration is rooted in the entire Mediterranean meal experience and is showcased in our mezze, share plates, and signature meats. Sheesh is a story of delicious food, healthy eating, and warm hospitality.

Welcome to
Gyro Aegean Grill
Our Restaurant Is A Collective Of Amazing People Striving To Build Delightful Greek and Mediterranean Cuisine.
Gyro Aegean Grill is the first Greek boutique restaurant in the heart of Woodstock, GA. A family fun filled environment catering to locals and out of towners. Gyro Aegean Grill offers dine-in, takeout, and catering services.

People Say About Us!
âToday was our first visit dining here and boy were we blown away! We saw they opened at 11:30 and arrived a few minutes early. We were immediately waved in by the man opening the door.â
Candee Niss
âAmazingly fresh food!  THE best Babaganoush I have ever had!  It was almost like a mousse consistency, great flavor!  All of the vegetables were fresh and happy.â
Kelly Meholic
âThis was our 1st time in the area and we enjoy gyros so we decided to give this place a try.  You will be amazed the staff was really welcoming and friendly.â
Sharon Downs Thomas
âGreek salad is great! Gyro was off the chain. 10/10 Will come back. I hope they have baklava!â
Carly jouse
âGreat Greek food in downtown Woodstock.  The souvlaki with a side of Greek potatoes (pictured) is a wonderful reminder of eating my grandmother's Greek cooking as a child.â
Jason Behret
âThe food was so fresh and delicious. I will definitely be back. I cannot wait to try some of the other entrees. So many wonderful flavors.â
Kate Billings

Have a Taste of Our Delectable Mediterranean Dishes
Welcome
We use only the best ingredients that keep customers coming back time and again
Supporting the community was a no-brainer for us. We proudly sponsored local events, rallied behind nearby schools, and took part in initiatives that aimed to strengthen our community’s bonds. It was all about giving back to the place that welcomed us with open arms.
Quality was at the heart of everything we did. Freshness was our mantra, and every dish was a testament to our commitment to using the best ingredients. From scratch, we crafted culinary creations that were a symphony of flavors, a dance of spices that echoed the authenticity of the Mediterranean.
As we spread our wings to Cumming, Georgia, we were met with the same warmth and enthusiasm. Our journey continued, our story unfolding in a new setting. The House of Hummus Mediterranean Café wasn’t just a name; it was a reflection of my passion for sharing the joy of Mediterranean cuisine and creating a hub where people could come together.
So, here’s to more chapters, more memories, and more delicious moments. The story of House of Hummus is far from over, and I’m excited to see where the next pages take us.
Serving Healthy and Richly Flavored Mediterranean Dishes
We're a Family Business
﻿
For over a decade, we’ve been on an incredible journey, serving the Alpharetta, Georgia area with a taste of the Mediterranean. And now, our journey has taken us to the lovely town of Cumming, Georgia.
From day one, ou
plinko
r goal was clear: to create a space where the vibrant flavors of the Mediterranean could shine. Being locally owned and operated was important to us; it meant we were more than just a café – we were a part of the community’s fabric. Our mission went beyond serving food; it was about creating a gathering place where relationships were formed and stories were shared.
Fans of tasty and healthy food have long liked hummus – a dish with a rich history and many variations. The House Hummus company not only offers classic and original recipes, but also creates a food culture where natural ingredients and high quality products come to the fore. In conditions when you want to eat healthy, but without compromising on taste, such offers become especially relevant.

It is interesting that a balanced diet is important not only for the body, but also for the mind. This is especially true for gamers and those who spend a lot of time at the computer. It turns out that proper nutrition can directly affect concentration, reaction and even endurance during the gameplay. You can read more about this on the website
food-monitor.de
– there are specific examples of the influence of nutrition on cognitive functions and tips on how to improve gaming results with simple changes in the diet.

This approach combines two worlds – gastronomic and digital. And hummus can take a significant place here: rich in proteins, fiber and healthy fats, it can be a great alternative to fast food for those who want to feel energetic even in the midst of a gaming marathon.

Menu
Street Food. Real Food.
Street Pitas
Street Pita comes with lettuce, tomato, onion, one side, and your choice of protein and sauce.
Options are Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Pita Platters
Platters comes with a base of rice and choice of one side.
Protein options include Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Bowls
Served on a base of seasoned rice and side with garlic Pita.
Served with lettuce, tomato, onions, and your choice of protein and sauce.
Options are Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Salads
Base of Harvest Blend. Served with Garlic Pita.
Packed with Lettuce, Tomato, Onion, Cucumber, Feta, Olives, Garbanzo beans and option to add your protein of choice: Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Greek Fries
Seasoned fries, crumbled feta, Parsley topped with street and house sauce. Option to top them with Steak or Gyro meat.
Starters
Let's start the party with your choice of Spanakopita, Gyro, Chicken or Cheese rolls, Traditional, Red Pepper or Harissa Hummus, Falafel starter, or Veggie Grape leaves.
Kids
All Kids Meals come with one side, dessert, and drink. Choose between Kids Gyro, Kids Chicken tenders, Kids Cheese Pita, or Kids Cheese rolls.
Desserts
Choose between our Baklava, Baklava Cheesecake, Knafeh, or Brownies.
Sauces
We have a flavor for everyone! Choose between Tzatziki, Spicy Tzatziki, Curry sauce, House sauce, Street sauce, Garlic, Tahini, or Greek Dressing.

ORDER NOW
Menu
Street Food. Real Food.
Street Pitas
Street Pita comes with lettuce, tomato, onion, one side, and your choice of protein and sauce.
Options are Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Pita Platters
Platters comes with a base of rice and choice of one side.
Protein options include Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Bowls
Served on a base of seasoned rice and side with garlic Pita.
Served with lettuce, tomato, onions, and your choice of protein and sauce.
Options are Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Salads
Base of Harvest Blend. Served with Garlic Pita.
Packed with Lettuce, Tomato, Onion, Cucumber, Feta, Olives, Garbanzo beans and option to add your protein of choice: Gyro meat, Chicken or Steak Shawarma, grilled Chicken, Falafel, or Seafood.
Greek Fries
Seasoned fries, crumbled feta, Parsley topped with street and house sauce. Option to top them with Steak or Gyro meat.
Starters
Let's start the party with your choice of Spanakopita, Gyro, Chicken or Cheese rolls, Traditional, Red Pepper or Harissa Hummus, Falafel starter, or Veggie Grape leaves.
Kids
All Kids Meals come with one side, dessert, and drink. Choose between Kids Gyro, Kids Chicken tenders, Kids Cheese Pita, or Kids Cheese rolls.
Desserts
Choose between our Baklava, Baklava Cheesecake, Knafeh, or Brownies.
Sauces
We have a flavor for everyone! Choose between Tzatziki, Spicy Tzatziki, Curry sauce, House sauce, Street sauce, Garlic, Tahini, or Greek Dressing.

PLEASE NOTE:
*SUBSTITUTES MAY INCUR ADDITIONAL CHARGES.
*PLEASE INFORM THE RESTAURANT OF ANY ALLERGIES PRIOR TO PLACING YOUR ORDER.
*ALL CHICKEN, BEEF AND MEAT SUBSTITUTES ARE MADE BY SOY PROTEIN. EVERYTHING ON THE MENU IS VEGAN.
APPETIZERS
=========
Borani Esfenaj
$12
Persian spinach and yogurt dip, sautéed spinach and onions in vegan Greek yogurt with spices, topped with walnuts, served with hot pita bread.
Hummus $10
Chickpeas blended with tahini, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic and spices, served with hot pita bread and fresh vegetables.
Falafel $10
A blend of chickpeas, onions, parsley, and spices, served with our homemade tahini sauce.
Persian Kotlet $12
Chickpea and bean patties made with potatoes and a blend of spices, served with hot Pita bread.
Dopiazeh Aloo $10
Persian mashed potatoes sautéed in onions, with a blend of spices, serves with hot Pita bread.
Kashk-o-Bademjoon $12
Sautéed eggplant with, walnuts, onions and spices. Served with hot pita bread.
Neek Sampler $25
A combination of Falafel, Hummus, Borani Esfenaj, Dopiazeh Aloo, and hot Pita bread.
=========
SOUPS
=========
Ashe Reshteh (Persian Soup)
Cup $6 / Bowl $9
A flavorful mix of chickpeas, beans, lentils, and fresh herbs, combined with spaghetti and a variety of spices for a wholesome and aromatic dish.
Greek Chickpea Soup
Cup $5 / Bowl $8
A blend of vegetables, spices, and chickpeas in a vegetable broth.
Red Lentil Soup
Cup $5 / Bowl $8
A delicious lentil soup made of red lentils, onions, tomatoes, carrots, potatoes, and spices.
Cream of Vegetable Soup
Cup $5 / Bowl $8
A blend of vegetables and oats in a creamy broth.
Soup and Salad $15
A cup of soup and a side salad. Served with hot pita bread.
=========
SALADS & VEGAN BOWLS
=========
Greek Chickpea Salad $14
Fresh garden vegetables with chickpeas, feta cheese and a homemade Greek dressing.
Beet & Chickpea Salad $14
Beets, arugula, onions, walnuts, Feta cheese, and chickpeas with a homemade balsamic lemon dressing.
Broccoli Salad $14
Broccoli, walnuts, cranberries, onions and pepitas in a homemade creamy dressing.
Lentil Barberry Salad $16
Lentils, peppers, onions, barberries, cucumbers, avocados, celery, spinach, and cashews. Served with a homemade balsamic lemon dressing.
Quinoa Tabbouleh Salad $12
Parsley, quinoa, cucumbers, tomatoes, mint, diced onions, and parsley with a lemon vinaigrette.
Shirazi Bowl $16
Shirazi salad, dampokht kalam (cabbage mixed rice), sabzi (fresh herbs) and avocado slices topped with hemp hearts.
Falafel Bowl $16
Falafels, quinoa tabbouleh salad, pita bread and hummus.
Tofu Bowl $16
Fresh tomatoes, cucumbers, Kalamata olives with Dampokht Gojeh (Tomato mixed rice) and tofu.
=========
SANDWICHES & BURGERS
=========

Soy protein kabob topped with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, parsley, sumac and a homemade creamy sauce on a baguette.
Philly Cheesesteak Sandwich  $14
Soy protein with grilled mushrooms, onions and peppers topped with melted cheese, mayo and spices on a baguette.
Eggplant Sandwich $12
Our eggplant dip, slow-cooked with rich spices, topped with Shirazi salad, arugula, walnuts, and a homemade tahini sauce on a baguette.

Falafels with parsley, tomatoes, onions and pickled cabbage topped with our homemade tahini sauce on Pita bread.
Hummus Wrap $12
Our delicious hummus topped with Shirazi salad, avocado slices, and arugula. Served on Pita bread.
Kotlet Wrap $12
Homemade chickpea and bean patty topped with lettuce, tomatoes, onions and pickles with a homemade creamy sauce. Served on pita bread.

=========

=========
PERSIAN STEWS

Q:
Do most of their cones stop almost as low as the cone?

No, you have the option to get petite or a regular size which reflects the amount of soft serve. Their is only one size of the waffle cone. That's why in some of the cones you see the soft serve isn't piled so high. Get a regular if you want more…

About the Business
Ledet Ethiopian Restaurant has been serving the Atlanta community since 2001, offering an authentic taste of Ethiopia that feels just like a meal made by mum. Our family-owned restaurant is more than just a place to eat—it’s a place where culture, comfort, and community come together.

Located at 4975 Memorial Dr, Stone Mountain, GA, Ledet offers a warm, inviting atmosphere with sectional booths perfect for intimate dinners or lively group gatherings. From sizzling tibs to flavorful vegan and gluten-free options, every dish is crafted with care, bringing the rich flavors of Ethiopia to your table.

Whether you’re dining in, grabbing a quick bite from our drive-thru, or hosting a special event in our spacious banquet hall, Ledet ensures every meal is a celebration of tradition, family, and home-cooked goodness.

Join us and experience the flavors of Ethiopia—made with love, just like mum’s.

About Us
At Plant Based Pizzeria, we believe that delicious food can be healthy and cruelty-free. We are committed to providing tasty plant-based options without compromising on flavor or quality.

Indulge in our mouthwatering plant-based pizzas, made with fresh ingredients and topped with vegan cheese. We also offer a variety of other tasty options to satisfy all your cravings.

Halsa Menu
Our menu features dishes  made with local ingredients from Georgia farms.  Fifty percent of our menu is vegetarian and our build-your-own bowl menu lets you create your perfect grain bowl. End your meal with a cocktail sweetened with local honey or agave nectar, or one of our smoothies or fresh-squeezed juices.

All-Day Brunch & Breakfast in College Park
Sweet, savory, boozy, bold—our brunch menu is made to impress. From peach cobbler lattes to jerk chicken & waffles, we bring flavor with every bite.
Order Online
Bold Brunch, Big Flavor
All-Day Breakfast and Brunch in the Heart of College Park
Welcome to The Breakfast Boys—where Southern comfort meets global flavor. Our all-day brunch menu is packed with crave-worthy dishes like jerk chicken & sweet potato waffles, pineapple upside-down French toast, and shrimp & grits with a kick. Pair it with a peach cobbler latte or passionfruit mimosa, and you've got the makings of Atlanta's boldest brunch. Whether you're stopping in solo or rolling deep with your brunch crew, we've got something for every taste—and every vibe.

●  DISCOVER
Our Story
WE HAVE THE GLORY BEGINING IN RESTAURANT BUSINESS
At Bakaris, we craft pizzas with the freshest plant-based ingredients, from savory meat alternatives to creamy vegan cheeses and vibrant veggies. Whether you're craving a classic cheese pizza or the spicy Hawaiian Plant-based Pizza, we've got something for everyone.
But the goodness doesn't stop here. Our plant-based pizza burgers are loaded with flavor, like the classic Bakaris Beyond burger with Wakanda special sauce or the unique Sloppy Vegan Burger topped with our signature sauce and plantains.
Join us at Bakaris Plant-based Pizza and taste future of plant-based dining!

Our Story
WE HAVE THE GLORY BEGINING IN RESTAURANT BUSINESS
At Bakaris, we craft pizzas with the freshest plant-based ingredients, from savory meat alternatives to creamy vegan cheeses and vibrant veggies. Whether you're craving a classic cheese pizza or the spicy Hawaiian Plant-based Pizza, we've got something for everyone.
But the goodness doesn't stop here. Our plant-based pizza burgers are loaded with flavor, like the classic Bakaris Beyond burger with Wakanda special sauce or the unique Sloppy Vegan Burger topped with our signature sauce and plantains.
Join us at Bakaris Plant-based Pizza and taste future of plant-based dining!
Read more about us
●  OUR SERVICE  ●
What We Focus On
At Bakaris our Plant-based pizza Restaurant. We are committed to offering delicious, healthy, and sustainable dining options. We focus on using fresh, locally sourced ingredients to craft pizzas that are both flavorful and nutritious. Our team priorities exceptional customer service, ensuring every guest enjoys a warm and welcoming experience. Additionally, we emphasize eco-friendly practices in our operations, from packaging to waste reduction, to contribute positively to the environment and our community.

Frequently Asked Question
What makes your Pizza Plant-based?
Our pizza is entirely plant-based, meaning it contains no animal products such as meat, dairy, or eggs. We use a variety of delicious ingredients, high quality plant-based ingredients, including vegan cheeses, plant-based meats, and fresh vegetables. Even our crust and sauces are made without any animal-derived ingredients, making our pizzas great choice for vegans, vegetarians, and anyone looking to enjoy a tasty, cruelty-free meal.
Are your Ingredients Organic?
We prioritize using organic and locally sourced ingredients whenever possible. Our commitment to quality means we choose the freshest and most sustainable options for our pizzas. While not every ingredient may be certified organic, we carefully select suppliers who share our values in promoting health and sustainability.
Can I customize my Pizza with different toppings?
Absolutely! We offer a wide range of plant-based toppings, from classic veggies to innovative plant-based meats and cheeses. You can build your own pizza just the way you like it, ensuring a meal that's both delicious and tailored to your taste. If you're unsure about combinations, our staff is always ready to recommend popular choices!
Do you Offer takeout and delivery services?
Yes, we offer both takeout and delivery services to make it convenient for you to enjoy our delicious plant-based pizzas at home or on the go. You can place your order online, over the phone, or in person. We partner with local delivery services to ensure your pizza arrives hot and fresh. Please check our website for delivery areas and times.
Can't make it to Kava today? No problem. You can still indulge in Bakari's mouthwatering plant-based pizza with pickup or delivery on Slice. Even the biggest meat lovers admit it - our plant-based pizzas are irresistibly delicious. And with our Beyond and Impossible burgers, you won't miss the meat, not one bit. Add in our fresh salads, wraps, and other healthy options, and you've got a feast that's ready when you are.
So, get your slice of the action and a big smile in the historic West End of Atlanta. But if you're staying in, make sure to enjoy our incredible dishes right at home. Don't settle for less - get the best, now.

18% Gratuity for parties of 7 or more. Checks cannot be split for parties of 10 or more. Please let us know of any food allergies. Some of our items contain nuts. *Consuming raw or undercooked food may increase the risk of food-borne illnesses.
BOLD BEER
BELGIANS
SPRING’S PROMISE, 5.2%, 16oz…..9
Known as being the “beer of the people”, this Saison has a light, dry body, and pours straw colored with a brilliant white foam. Mild spice notes play on the taste buds leaving a clean, refreshing finish
WALK ON WATER WITBIER, 5.3%, 16oz…..7
Our 2020 U.S. Open Silver Medal award-winning Belgian Witbier is brewed with lemon, orange peel, and coriander
PROVIDENCE SINGLE, 4.6%, 16oz…..7
Low in alcohol and refreshing for the soul, Providence is brewed with a blend of Belgian pale, pilsner malts, and a touch of wheat. What makes this beer really shine are the five continental hops that this beer is brewed with: Mittelfrüh, Saaz, Styrian Goldings, Spalter Select, and Belgian Cascades. Light and delicate notes of citrus play off the Belgian spiciness of the yeast. A simple but elegant beer.
DISCIPLINE DUBBEL, 7.3%, 14oz…..7
Our 2020 U.S. Open Gold Medal award-winning Belgian Dubbel with notes of toasted bread, brandied cherry, and caramel
THE WAY TRIPEL, 8.8%, 14oz…..8
Our 2021, 2024 U.S. Open Gold Medal award-winning Belgian Tripel boasts honeydew and citrus notes
INDOMINUS QUADRUPEL, 9.7%, 14oz…..9
Our 2023 U.S. Open Gold Medal award-winning dangerously drinkable dark Belgian Ale. Notes of raisin, cacao, and burnt sugar
REJOICE! CELEBRATORY ALE, 9%, 14oz…..9
Brewed to celebrate Bold Monk’s 5th anniversary, Rejoice! pours a beautiful pinkish-red with luscious tropical notes of citrus and rose petals with the tart sweetness of raspberries all supported by a fresh hoppiness
LAGERS
FESTBIER, 6.5%, .5L…..7
Prost! Our Oktoberfest style beer. Rich and malty with just enough Saphir hops to leave you wanting more! Zum Wohl!
PADRE MISSION LAGER, 4.8%, 16oz…..7
Our 2022 U.S. Open Silver Medal award-winning Mexican-style lager, this slightly amber lager drinks cleanly with balanced malt overtones that finishes crisp and dry, sure to leave your thirst quenched in the Atlanta heat
UMIBOZU PREMIUM LAGER, 5%, 16oz…..7
Clean and dry with a distinct note of Jasmine rice used in the mash. Hopped with Pacifica and Mandarina hops for a subtle New World hop finish
CHANT PILSNER, 5.4%, 16oz…..7
Our beloved dry-hopped Pilsner beer. German malt with a delicate hop spiciness
FOEDER – BARREL AGED – LIMITED RELEASE
ALL IS VANITY FOEDER FERMENTED SAISON, 6% 500ml BOTTLE…..9
Our 2023 U.S. Open Gold Medal award-winning foeder fermented with our house Saison blend and Brettanomyces Clausenii to produce subtle tropical funk notes accented perfectly with German Diamant hops
BARREL AGED + LIMITED SELECTIONS:
Refer to our limited release beer menu to view our barrel aged selections
IPA’S + STOUTS + SOURS
SHARED SPIRIT IPA 6.5% 16oz…..8
Our 2022 U.S. Open Bronze Medal award-winning contemporary IPA with Southern Passion, Citra, Lotus, Simcoe and Azacca hops
GENESIS WEST COAST IPA, 6.8%, 16oz…..8
In the beginning there were hops! This West Coast style IPA is where it all began. Deliciously dry and hoppy with a lingering, pleasant bitterness leaving you wanting the next sip. Brewed simply with “OG” hops- Centennial, Columbus, Simcoe and Amarillo
COMPASSION, 5.8%, 16oz…..8
Just in time to quench your thirst in the Atlanta summer heat, this fruited sour exudes flavors of raspberry and blueberry added post-fermentation, coupled with the tart sensation derived from the use of Sourvisiae yeast
BROTHER IVAN RUSSIAN IMPERIAL STOUT, 9.7%, 16oz…..9
Winner of the 2024 U.S. Open Beer Championship Silver Medal, Brother Ivan is a rich, complex Imperial Stout with notes of fruit, roasted coffee, and chocolate
GUEST TAPS + BOTTLES
SHACKSBURY CIDER, VERGENNES, VT- ARLO BASQUE-STYLE CIDER 6% ABV…..7
SHACKSBURY CIDER, VERGENNES, VT- CLASSIC DRY CIDER 5.5% ABV…..7

At Bold Monk, we offer a variety of experiences, including a bookstore with curated selections for purchase in our upstairs Abbey, Bold Monk retail gifts located at our host area, and a beer garden located across the bridge from the Abbey upstairs.

The Story Of Our
Alkaline
Journey
At Life Bistro, we are committed to serving food that promotes life in its many forms.  Our dishes highlight cuisine from around the world while featuring savory soul food, veganized. Our aim is to help others transition to a more conscious diet by ensuring that the food is tantalizingly delicious. Come in and try the best vegan soul food in Atlanta.
The Menu
Please note, we are a from scratch kitchen that cooks each dish to order. During busy times, orders can take anywhere from 30 minutes to 1.5 hours to prepare. We will do our best to update you as preparation times change.

Testimonials
“
The first time I visited Life Bistro was on Valentine’s Day. My date and I ordered just about everything on the menu because we wanted to taste EVERYTHING! I can honestly say that everything we tried was LOVE in your mouth. I can’t pick one dish that I’d prefer over another so I just order something different every time I go. The staff is so accommodating and friendly. The ambiance is a str8 vibe! Definitely my go-to date night spot.
”
-Beast Gang
Google Review
“
I ordered the kale wrap and citrus detox....very yummy and will definitely return! Crazy thing I’m not even vegan but enjoy good healthy food and this hit the spot!
”
-Laura Long
Google Review
“
Delicious food, excellent customer service. A great addition to Atlanta's burgeoning southside!! "Minutes from the interstates and Hartsfield Jackson. Ample parking and did I say a delicious and inventive vegan menu!! I have so many favorites. Life Bistro is definitely a weekly restaurant destination.
”
Zadi Maynard

Today’s Specials
ATTENTION PLEASE
Servers make less than minimum wage and rely heavily on tips to make a living. As our team continues to provide you with exceptional service, help us take care of those who take care of you. An auto gratuity of 20% is added to Bar Tabs, Parties of 5 or More and Checks of $100 or More.
CONSUMER ADVISORY
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness. We do use the whole loaf of bread, including end pieces. We use parsley and green onions, as garnish on most menu items. PLEASE BE ADVISED THAT THE FOOD PREPARED HERE MAY CONTAIN THESE INGREDIENTS AND WE CANNOT GUARANTEE THAT ANY OF OUR PRODUCTS ARE SAFE TO CONSUME IF YOU ARE ALLERGIC TO: MILK, EGGS, WHEAT, SOYBEAN, PEANUTS, TREE NUTS, FISH, AND SHELLFISH
House Rules
1) We do not seat incomplete parties. If complete parties are not present at time of seating then we must move to the next party on the waitlist.
2) ALL SALES ARE FINAL - your server will confirm your order at the table. ALL FOOD AND ALCOHOL SALES ARE FINAL upon ordering so please review menu descriptions before ordering.
3) Menu modifications are extremely limited due to the nature of the business. Please be understanding.
4) Wait times - our food is fresh and made to order and is worth the wait. We do our best to estimate wait times. We are not able to discount tickets for wait times.
5) 90 minute limit on table - please be considerate of other guests waiting to dine.
6) No unruly behavior is permitted. No yelling or using profanity with our staff.

ATTENTION PLEASE
Servers make less than minimum wage and rely heavily on tips to make a living. As our team continues to provide you with exceptional service, help us take care of those who take care of you. An auto gratuity of 20% is added to Bar Tabs, Parties of 5 or More and Checks of $100 or More.
CONSUMER ADVISORY
Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness. We do use the whole loaf of bread, including end pieces. We use parsley and green onions, as garnish on most menu items.
HOUSE RULES
We do not seat incomplete parties. If complete parties are not present at time of seating then we must move to the next party on the waitlist.
ALL SALES ARE FINAL - your server will confirm your order at the table. ALL FOOD AND ALCOHOL SALES ARE FINAL upon ordering so please review menu descriptions before ordering.
Menu modifications are extremely limited due to the nature of the business. Please be understanding.
Wait times - our food is fresh and made to order and is worth the wait. We do our best to estimate wait times. We are not able to discount tickets for wait times.
90 minute limit on table - please be considerate of other guests waiting to dine.
No unruly behavior is permitted. No yelling or using profanity with our staff.

Our Signature Avocado Bulgogi

"Feel Good", Gluten-Free Food

MENU
Our menu is gluten-free and made with high quality, real ingredients. Every bowl and plate comes with your choice of base: jasmine or brown rice, cauliflower rice, purple sweet potato noodles, or citrus-marinated kale.
GF = Gluten-free, V = Vegan | Download our nutritional information
here
.
Appetizers

Our Special Menu
Menu
Vegetarian
Vegetarian Combo
A medley of traditional dishes including split peas (kik alicha), spicy red lentils (misir wot), shiro, beets, cabbage and green peas. Served with Injera.
$19.99
Vegetarian
Tuna Salad
A refreshing blend of flaked tuna mixed with crisp lettuce, tomatoes, red onions and green peppers.
$11.99
Vegetarian
Fish Gullash
Stew made with tender chunks of fish simmered in a rich sauce of slow-cooked red onions, garlic, tomato and Ethiopian spices. Seasoned with berbere and finished with a touch of spiced butter.
$19.99
Vegetarian
Shiro
A creamy vegetarian stew made from chickpea flour, simmered with oil, salt, garlic, tomato and red onions. A staple of Ethiopian cuisine.
$18.99
Vegetarian
Veggie Firfir with Salad
Injera pieces mixed with sauteed onions, tomatoes, green peppers and seasoned with berbere and garlic.
$18.99
Vegetarian
Salad
A refreshing mix of ripe tomatoes, crispy cucumbers, green peppers and red onions. Lightly dressed with lemon juice and olive oil and seasoned with salt and black pepper.
$10.99
Vegetarian
Whole Fried Fish
Seasoned with salt, garlic and pepper, breaded and fried to a golden crisp. Crispy outside, juicy inside.
$14.99
Vegetarian
Fish Cotelet
Tilapia fillets coated in seasoned breading, fried in vegetable oil and served with a crunchy side salad.
$16.99
Vegetarian
Meat Lovers
Lega Tibs
Tender chopped beef sauteed with yellow onion, tomato, garlic powder, rosemary, green pepper and butter. Perfectly seasoned to deliver rich, savory and authentic Ethiopian  flavor.
$19.99
Meat Lovers
Geba Wota
Medium-cut beef cooked to juicy perfection with garlic, rosemary, oil and butter. A deeply flavorful and well-balanced dish.
$19.99
Meat Lovers
Dullet
A traditional Ethiopian mix of finely chopped lamb stomach, liver and ribeye, seasoned with cardamom, garlic, salt, mitmita (Ethiopian cayenne pepper) and butter. Served raw, medium or well-done.
$18.99
Meat Lovers
Kitfo Dulet
A savory blend of groud beef, cardamom, salt, mitmita, red onion and green pepper, blended with rich Ethiopian butter. Can be served raw, medium or well-done based on preference.
$20.99
Meat Lovers
Lamb Tibs
Chopped lamb sauteed with red onions, green pepper and butter. Choose spicy or mild.
$22.99
Meat Lovers
Tenderloin Filet Mignon
Our tenderloin filet mignon can be enjoyed in. variety of traditional Ethiopian styles - Zilzil Tibs, featuring tender grilled beef strips seasoned with bold spices; as Derek Tibs, chopped beef sauteed to a crispy finish; as Lega Tibs, tender cuts sauteed with onions and green peppers; or as Geba Wota, a rich and flavorful Ethiopian stew.
$25.99
Meat Lovers
Regular Kitfo
Minced raw beef, marinated in mitmita ( a chili-based spice powder) and niter kibbeh (a clarified butter infused with herbs and spices).
$20.99
Meat Lovers
Special Kitfo with Kocho
Finely minced beef, seasoned with freshly ground cardamom and cayenne pepper then mixed with house-made spced Ethiopian butter (niter kibbeh). It is served with mild cottage cheese (ayib) and sauteed greens (gomen), Kocho, a dense slightly sour flatbread made from fermented enset (false banana)
$26.99
Meat Lovers
Special Kitfo without Kocho
Finely minced beef, seasoned with freshly ground cardamom and cayenne pepper then mixed with house-made spced Ethiopian butter (niter kibbeh). It is served with mild cottage cheese (ayib) and sauteed greens (gomen).
$25.99
Meat Lovers
Special Kitfo with Kocho & Ethiopian Injera
Finely minced beef, seasoned with freshly ground cardamom and cayenne pepper then mixed with house-made spced Ethiopian butter (niter kibbeh). It is served with mild cottage cheese (ayib) and sauteed greens (gomen), Kocho, a dense slightly sour flatbread made from fermented enset (false banana) served with Ethiopian injera.
$27.99
Meat Lovers
Salayish
Tender beef is finely chopped and mixed with red onion, tomato, garlic and salt then blended with injera. Topped with kitfo and ayib (Ethiopian cottage cheese) and garnished with fresh green pepper for a colorful, flavorful finish.
$25.99
Meat Lovers
Kurt
A traditional Ethiopian delicacy made from raw, USDA-approved grass fed beef, known for its exceptional tenderness and flavor. Served fresh with cayenne pepper, hot sauce and sinafich (a spicy Ethiopian mustard or horseradish relish), offering a bold and authentic experience.
$25.99
Meat Lovers
Meat Combo
Includes your choice of Kurt, Kitfo or Dulet, Legal Tibs or Awaze Derk Tibs and Geba Wot. Served with your choice of Gomen (seasoned collard greens) or Kikil (a hearty bone-in meat stew), this combo showcases a variety of Ethiopia's finest meat dishes.
$37.00
Meat Lovers
Special Meat Combo
Includes everything in the Meat Combo, plus your choice of three or four traditional Ethiopian vegetarian sides - bringing balance and variety to your meal.
$45.00
Meat Lovers
Minchet Abish
Finely ground beef simmered in a rich sauce of sauteed red onions, garlic and Ethiopian clarified butter (niter kibbeh). Infused with berbere (a bold Ethiopian spice blend) and abish (fenugreek).
$21.99
Meat Lovers
Zilzil Tibs
Marinated beef strips with salt, hot pepper, rosemary and garlic, grilled to perfection.
$21.99
Meat Lovers
Derek Tibs
Crispy sauteed beef, chopped and mixed with onions, salt and green peppers.
$19.99
Meat Lovers
1/2 Kurt + 1/2 Tibs
Half portion of raw beef (Kurt) with your choice of Derek Tibs or Geba Wota.
$25.99
Meat Lovers
Milas & Senber
A hearty mix of beef tongue, kidney, stomach (senber), and lean meat. Slow-coked with onions, green peppers, garlic, oil, salt and rosemary. Rich in flavor and comforting.
$19.99
Meat Lovers
Gomen Besiga
Tender beef cooked with collard greens, onions, garlic and Ethiopian spices. A hearty and nutritious dish.
$18.99
Meat Lovers
Lamb Kikil
Tender lamb chunks simmered with onion, garlic, ginger and salt. A comforting and flavorful Ethiopian stew.
$19.99
Meat Lovers
Shekla Tibs
Tender cuts of beef sauteed with jalapenos, garlic salt,garlic powder and rosemary. Served sizzling hot in a traditional ceramic dish to keep dish warm and aromatic throughout your meal.
$24.99
Meat Lovers
Keye Wot (Ye Beg)
Ethiopian lamb stew, made with tender cuts of lamb slow-cooked in a deeply flavorful sauce of caramelized red onions, garlic, Ethiopian spiced butter (niter kibbeh) and berbere - a bold blend of chili peppers and warm spices.
$22.99
Meat Lovers
Doro Wot
Made with bone-in chicken drumsticks or thighs, this dish is slow-cooked in a rich, spicy sauce of caramelized red onions, garlic, ginger, Ethiopian spiced butter (niter kibbeh) and berbere spice.
$22.99
Meat Lovers
Quanta Firfir
Made with shredded injera mixed with pieces of quanta-air-dried, spiced beef. The dish is sauteed with a rich blend of berbere spice, garlic and Ethiopian spiced butter (niter kibbeh).
$24.99
Meat Lovers
Pasta with Meat
Pasta with Meat features tender noodles tossed in a rich, savory sauce made from perfectly seasoned ground meat, simmered tomatoes, garlic, onions and aromatic herbs.
$16.99
Meat Lovers
Scrambled Egg
Our Scrambled Egg Firfir combines fluffy scrambled eggs with sautéed onions, tomatoes, and green peppers, seasoned with oil, salt, and black pepper.
$13.99
Egg Slice
Our Juicy Egg Firfir features slices of eggs sautéed with onions, tomatoes, and hot peppers, cooked in oil for a flavorful and spicy dish.
$14.99
Awaze Tibs
Bite-sized beef sauteed with red onion, tomato, garlic and rosemary then seasoned with Ethiopian hot pepper and butter.
$19.99
Meat Lovers
Goden Tibs (Pan-Fried Ribs)
Succulent beef ribs pan-fried and marinated with Ethiopian spices including garlic, salt, rosemary and hot pepper.
$22.99
Meat Lovers
Bozena Shiro
A hearty dish of chickpea flour (shiro) cooked with oil, onions, tomatoes and chopped meat. Rich flavorful and comforting.
$20.99

KIDS MENU
HAPPY HOUR FOOD - BAR ONLY
WHAT’S ALL THIS BUZZ ABOUT DINING TAPAS STYLE?
in spain, these savory snacks are part of the quintessential spanish bar experience. think small plates of chorizo, mediterranean olives, manchego cheese, and a generous pour of rioja wine. at bulla, tapas style dining is a great way to try many different dishes. made with the finest and freshest ingredients, bulla’s gastronomic creations include traditional favorites like ‘patatas bravas’ and house specialties like ‘huevos bulla.’ small plates. larger plates. it’s all part of the fun.

Isaiah DeBenedetto
2025-03-07T14:21:36-07:00
hello, alpharetta.
we’re ready to treat you to real food & serious flavor.
Location & Hours
Download Menu
Group Dining
Catering Menu
Seasonal Menu
At True Food Kitchen, our menu is carefully crafted so that every bite and every refreshing sip serve up big flavor, an abundance of fresh ingredients and a taste of the unexpected. Our artisan chefs create crave-worthy classics alongside a steady rotation of seasonal offerings that take advantage of naturally ripe fruits and vegetables so their flavor is full and their nutrients, rich. Creative, hand-crafted beverages built around seasonality, quality ingredients and simple preparations complement every occasion from brunch, lunch, dinner and, of course, dessert. Always room for dessert.
Important Information About Our Menu
Menu pricing varies by location – to view location-specific menus, visit our
locations
page.
*These items may be served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
Please be aware that our restaurants use gluten and ingredients that contain all the major FDA allergens (peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, milk, sesame, soy and wheat).
Our restaurants have shared cooking and preparation areas and the possibility exists for food items to come into contact with other food products. Due to these circumstances, we are unable to guarantee that any menu item can be completely free of allergens. In addition, while effort is made to keep our product information current and as complete as possible, it is possible that ingredient changes and substitutions may occur due to differences in regional suppliers, recipe revisions, preparation techniques, and/or the season of the year.
Before placing your order, please inform your server if someone in your party has a food allergy or a special dietary need and we will do our best to make accommodations.
View our nutritional guide
here
.

Petit Chou Atlanta - Cabbagetown Bistro on Memorial Drive
French with a Southern twist : An Industrial Chic locale offering coffee, pastries, breakfast, lunch and dinner (Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays & Saturdays).  And now beer, wine and cocktails!  Dinner coming soon!
